name_left: Malibu Guest house/ near beach
description:
The space
Little, mid century, ranch style, private guest house, on Point Dume Headlands.
We are surrounded by Big & Little Dume coves, Westward & Zuma Beaches, in center of the peninsula. Beach access is down headlands. Malibu is 21 miles long and 4 mi. wide into the mountains.

Cottage has one bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, living room,w/ large tv and wifi. Picture window looks back to mountains, & down to our lovely tennis court. Bring your own or borrow rackets to play.
A lovely private tennis-and-beach getaway with lots of open land, set in Malibu's beloved Point Dume neighborhood. The clean, detached space has a homey feel, smart swing-out windows for fresh Malibu sea air, and the rooms have wi-fi, a desk area, (great for writers), entertainment system, breakfast table,and a full kitchen.
We have cultural touches inside the guest-house like the Beatles Anthology, complete cartoons of The New Yorker, a "Far Side" comics collection, new and vin

host_about:
We love sharing our beautiful Point Dume Peninsula and surrounding beaches.
 My Career - Cinematography- Husband also in entertainment. 
We enjoy tennis, hiking, biking, films, and art.  Hometowns Memphis, Tenn.,Oxford, Miss, and  lovely Malibu, California. Montana, Manhattan, N.Y. , Sweden, Ireland , are part of us .
 Enjoy interesting, kind people during their travels. We have an amazing list of guests, from authors, architects, athletes, performers, young professionals, to parents and grandparents.

name_left: Beautiful Ocean Front Beach House D
description:
A beautiful 2-bedroom Malibu beach house on a private beach with doors that open onto a 70ft.-long deck! Waterfall shower heads with glass walls that separates shower from bathroom. Second bathroom also has separate shower and a jacuzzi.

The space
Welcome to this beautiful 2-bedroom Malibu beach house on a private beach with doors that open onto a 70ft.-long deck!

The master bedroom has a queen-sized bed and an entrance to a bathroom.

The second bedroom has two twin beds, which can be made into a king. Also has an entrance to the second bathroom.

The master bathroom has walls and floors studied and designed for the beach and waterfall shower heads with glass walls that separates shower from bathroom. Second bathroom also has separate shower and a jacuzzi.

The house has hardwood floors and glass doors opening onto the deck that overlooks the Pacific Ocean. The dining table is a polished concrete counter-top. Gorgeous!<

I enjoy taking pictures of nature  and I pay close attention to the things around me. I cary my camera with me every where I go.  I also enjoy to sit back and listen.   I am a green person who loves nature and I am sure you can guess that my favorite color is green.

name_left: Dog Friendly 3BD Home on PRIVATE beach in Malibu
description:
There is probably no better way to escape and perhaps forget (if just temporarily) all the craziness in the world right now than by sitting on a deck overlooking the ocean and listening to the soothing sounds of the waves crashing below you..... this bright and airy two level, Nantucket style chic home is located directly on the sand on what is essentially a private beach. That means no crowds to contend or worry about. Just what the doctor ordered....

The space
When you stay at the 'Bu, you are sure to spend most of your time on one of two decks. The upper deck has a built in bench, 2 Adirondack chairs, and a stainless steel gas BBQ. The lower deck has a 15 foot long built in bench with cushions, a large dining table which seats 10, a six person hot tub, a heated shower and, everyone's favorite, the floating daybed. There are are stairs connecting the upper and lower decks and you have direct access to the beach from our own private stairs. You can relax and wa
neighborhood_overview:
Malibu is one of the hottest areas to visit in all of California. Not only does it kiss the Pacific Ocean but it also is minutes from all the downtown attractions. Plus, it is only a few miles from Santa Monica, so the possibilities for activity, adventure, shopping, touring, and relaxation are endless.

Our house is located 2 1/2 miles south of the Malibu Pier/Malibu Country Mart and 8 miles north of the Santa Monica Pier. About an hour's drive to Disneyland; 2 hours to San Diego (Legoland/San Diego Zoo). Close to a number of wonderful hiking and biking trails, parks, horseback riding tours, camping sites, and wine tastings.

name_left: Broad Beach Cape Cod
description:
The space
Beautiful, fully remodeled, Cape Cod Beach House, on exclusive Broad Beach. From every bedroom, you wake up and sleep to the sound of waves. This home is elegantly decorated, with open-beamed ceilings, lots of windows and natural light. It features 20 foot open beamed ceilings, and French doors leading out to the private patio on the beach and gardens in the back. Sleep to the peaceful sounds of the ocean in one of two spectacular master suites with a king size bed. Enjoy the outdoor fireplace on the private master deck. The master bathroom is finished with custom marble and tile and has a separate over size steam shower and deep soaking tub to relax in after a day at the beach. The first of three guest rooms features a king bed and French doors leading to the courtyard. A second guest room is perfect for children and has twin beds, with French doors leading out to a patio on the beach.

The house rents from $3-5K per night depending upon number of guest

name_left: Malibu Beachfront Penthouse
description:
Our luxury beach front Malibu penthouse is the ideal vacation destination.

Spend your time soaking up the sun on the balcony over the ocean or playing on the semi-private beach just below.

If you need a beach retreat... This is it.

The space
Tired of crowded beaches in the summertime?

Spend a weekend or more at your own semi-private beach in Malibu.

This is a rare property in Malibu which has a beach to itself and no neighboring structures or homes.

Tons of privacy and our own resident seal that will put a smile on your face.

Situated right on the Pacific Ocean, the floor to ceiling windows showcase breathtaking views all over the house.

The bedrooms are separated from the kitchen, dining room, and living room areas making this ideal for entertaining, hosting yoga retreats, and meditation workshops.

The panoramic views are ideal for taking in the magnificent sunrise
neighborhood_overview:
The Malibu property has unprecedented privacy as it sits alone on this stretch of the famous Pacific Coast Highway.

This property has the added advantage of being only a short drive from Malibu's award winning restaurants giving you plenty of options for a romantic evening on the town or a fun filled family lunch. It is also about 2 miles up the road from a neighborhood shopping center in the heart of Malibu where you can pick up some groceries to cook at home or swing by Starbucks for a morning coffee.

Malibu is a great place for outdoor activities too.

There is an almost limitless amount of beautiful natural beaches including: Surfrider Beach, Zuma Beach, Malibu Beach, Topanga Beach, Point Dume Beach and Dan Blocker Beach. The southern end of PCH also has the wildest sandy beach in the Malibu colony.

The nearby Santa Monica Mountains are home to many world-class parks such as: Malibu Bluffs Park (formerly Malibu Bluffs State Park)
host_about:
I'm Samir, I look forward to being your host, if you choose to stay at my private beach retreat in Malibu. 

I've owned the property for several years and have only begun sharing it with discerning travelers because the place is just too awesome to keep to myself. 

This is my weekend home and during the week I live in the Hollywood Hills and work in Los Angeles as a Real Estate developer, Film Producer and Studio Musician. I have two awesome dogs and I am grateful for the many amazing friends and gifts that life has given me. Hope to meet you soon.

name_left: Malibu Studio Enchanted Sea Cottage
description:
Private gated bluff acre above Westward Beach, Point Dume, next to famous Zuma Beach. Our ocean front private studio, with TWO PRIVATE ENTRANCES, ocean view from studio, full ocean view from large deck. Full kitchenette, glassed in shower, queen bed, daybed, TV, wifi, gardens, steps down bluff ( just completed now. Very clean, private and quiet, mostly the sounds of the waves. Our little gem by the sea.
NO parties or smoking or PETS PLEASE!

Registration - STR20-0076

The space
Our wonderful location is a real paradise, overlooking the sand and waves, dolphins almost daily, whales in season, sunsets right in front, summertime a little to the right. A great place to just relax and have fun at the beach or watch everything below from our 100 foot blufftop.

Guest access
Gated acre with lawns, gardens, trees, roses with full ocean views, pool not heated, but warms in late summer. Upper lawn garden is a peaceful grassy area
neighborhood_overview: Great family neighborhood, quiet, friendly and very safe. Mostly gated. Walk to the headlands on Point Dume Nature Reserve with views down the coast to Santa Monica, Long Beach, Catalina and Palos Verdes.  We are next to Famous Zuma Beach, with miles of clean sandy beach to enjoy.
host_about: Love living in such a beautiful place that keeps me so happy and grateful to have been here for over 30 years. It is great to share it all with others. I am a senior that loves life and meeting new people from all over the world.  Cannot live without watching the whales in season and dolphins almost daily and the most beautiful sunsets.

name_left: Paradise Cove View Guest house
description:
The space
Private upstairs guest house overlooking Paradise Cove, Malibu. One bedroom, full bath and well equipped kitchen. Two balcony patios overlooking rolling hills to the ocean. Have your morning coffee on the balcony and then wander off to explore beautiful Malibu and the greater Los Angeles area.

You will be about a half mile walk to Paradise Cove Beach, or from 2 miles (Zuma Beach) to 7 miles (Malibu Beach) from world famous beaches. If you like to hike, we are walking distance from California State and National parklands that offer beautiful and varied terrains for hiking or biking (or horseback riding).

We are a mile or less from restaurants, and grocery stores, and 6 miles from "downtown" Malibu, where you will find movie theaters, shops and restaurants.

Two large comfy couches in living room can be made up as beds for two additional guests (total max 4 guests) and would be approximately twin bed sized each. OUR MINIMUM RENT
host_about: My husband and I like to be outdoors...hiking, riding, playing beach volleyball take up much of our free time.  We like to travel, and have had fun meeting people from other places who come to stay at our guesthouse. While we like to visit the city, we enjoy the peace and quiet of living in a more rural area full time.

name_left: Fabulous Ocean Views at Malibu Dream Getaway
description:
Magnificent Ocean Views at Malibu Dream Getaway!

The space
Love the panoramic ocean views, play at nearby beaches, hike memorable mountain trails. Malibu has it all for a perfect seaside adventure. Whether it’s a romantic interlude, family fun or peaceful solitude by the sea, our guest apartment--Deja Bu--is right where you want to be for a lovely coastal escape. You can’t help but love the ‘Bu (Malibu to locals)!

This charming 1 bedroom/1bath guest apartment boasts your own private ocean-view patio, private entrance, full kitchen, washer/dryer, fully-tiled floors and high-quality furnishings. Located on a quiet street just 400 yards from the ocean as the crow flies and a two-minute drive, the enchanting blue Pacific fills the expansive window views from every room in the apartment. In fact, you’ll never get tired of gazing over the beguiling and ever-changing ocean from the queen-sized bed. From our elevation of 380 feet on a clear day, you can
neighborhood_overview: Fabulous ocean views, mountain views and quiet surroundings, and nature at your doorstep.
host_about: The apartment is the ground floor of a lovely Malibu home. When the owners (who live on the second floor) realized they didn’t need so much room for just the two of them, they decided to offer the lower level as a guest apartment.  Both are avid tennis players, beach volleyball players and hikers, so they can point you in the right direction for a myriad of the wonderful outdoor activities Malibu has to offer.

description:
Secluded ocean view Malibu property; pristine 3-acre gated estate. Sleeps 12. Beautiful gardens, sprawling lawns with stunning Pacific views. Tranquil starry nights, perfect for evening smores. Pool, jacuzzi, BBQ, fire pit with a lovely, large seating area. High-speed mesh WiFi, cable, Apple TV. Located 1/4 mile above Zuma Beach.

The space
Great indoor-outdoor living areas. The main house has 5 bedrooms, 4-1/2 baths, including a master suite with exceptional ocean views, a spa tub and a private deck. The house includes a living room; a spacious TV/game room with flat screen TV; a formal dining room that seats 10; a large, recently renovated eat-in kitchen that accommodates 6; Sub-Zero and other appliances; and a lovely patio for al fresco drinks and dining above the pool and fire pit. AV systems just upgraded with new monitors, Apple TV and other improvements. Separate guest quarters feature a queen bed, bath, pool table, flat screen TV and shared laundry facilit
neighborhood_overview:
Malibu is one of the most majestic and beautiful places in the world, and we absolutely are in love with it. We have canyon roads that would make you think you are driving on some rural mountain pass, and just minutes away are cozy private beach coves that you can have all to yourself. There are many delicious restaurants, and a grocery store only about a mile away. You can also do some wine tasting close by (about 7 miles) at the Malibu Family Vineyards and the Rocky Oaks Winery, and the world famous Zuma Beach is practically in your backyard as well.

Please Note: Casa Las Brisas is not available to be shown in person before booking. There are ample photos of the property, and there is a video available upon request. It is too time consuming to show the property to prospective guests in person. Rest assured, Casa Las Brisas is exactly how it is portrayed in the photos and the video.

Only one block to shopping, cafes and a great juice bar. Close to many great hiking trails with views. The Camarillo Outlet Mall is a half hour away. We have two parking permits for street parking directly in front of the condo. Any one can park in front of the unit for 90 minutes. If you would like to leave a car there longer, a parking permit is required from 8 a.m. to 6 p.m.
host_about: I am from Vera Cruz, Mexico and moved to Malibu 9 years ago.  My husband, Richard is originally from Australia and has been living in Malibu for 20 years.  We love living in Malibu and hope you enjoy it as much as we do.  It's a great place for family fun.  Your children can take surf lessons at Zuma Beach or relax at Paradise Cove and explore the tide pools. Since we will most likely be out of town when you visit, our good friend, Sandy, will manage everything for you.  She has lived in Malibu for 30 years and has worked as a private chef, personal assistant and nanny locally.  She knows the area well.

name_left: OCEAN FRONT MALIBU /SEA WHAT I SEA.
description:
VERY UNIQUE FUN,SEXY &RELAXING .THIS ARTSY 2 STORY BEACH CRIB RIGHT RIGHT ON THE WATER. THE OCEAN IS 10 YARDS FROM THE BED, YOU WILL NEVER GET A HOUSE CLOSER TO THE SEA . ROMANTIC, PEACEFUL,VERY PRIVATE& FULL OF ART. U SHOULD COME&SEA WHAT I SEA

The space
This is a special little stretch of beach, Very quiet an peaceful. Loaded with sealife such as seals, dolphins and at certain times of year you'll even see whales from inside the house! or better yet , from the kayak! (thats in winter, spring and fall usually) The beach is very often totally empty and theres hardly ever more than a few people on it .
Also note , the second bedroom is more of a universal room that converts into a second bedroom or whatever guests want it to be, It works very well , and still gives you an ocean view . I have been doing it for my guests for years and everyone has always been very comfortable and happy.

Guest access
Two exits from house to the beach
neighborhood_overview: This is a special part of Malibu, I like to call it the "pre-Bu"  Its just barely inside Malibu city limits, making it an easier commute. Also most of the people in this area are great. just really nice quiet people, not too fancy, but very very beachy and cool.
host_about: I am a commercial diver by trade. I did underwater construction for the oil co.s in the Gulf of Mexico for 12 years.  The sea is the first thing I ever loved . There is a romance between us that can not be explained This area I live in is special and has very special energy that heals and restores ones mind body and soul like no other place, and I just feel it needs to be available for others to benefit from.  I just want  the same thing for everyone, myself included. To enjoy life , and be well.

We're also conveniantly located minutes from world class dining, wine tasting, shopping and 6 minutes to Pepperdine.

neighborhood_overview: An affluent beach town west of downtown Los Angeles, Malibu consists of 27-miles of prime Pacific coastline. The community is famous for its warm, sandy beaches which include Surfrider, Zuma, Malibu, Topanga and Point Dume to name just a few. The best restaurants, Whole Foods Market and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance. As is the Malibu Pier, the historical Adamson house, water sports, and the world-famous Surfrider Beach…  With a short car ride, you will find some of the best hiking and biking in the Santa Monica Mountains.

neighborhood_overview:
Malibu is one of the hottest areas to visit in all of California. Not only does it kiss the Pacific Ocean but it also is minutes from all the downtown attractions. Plus, it is only a few miles from Santa Monica, so the possibilities for activity, adventure, shopping, touring, and relaxation are endless.

Our house is located 2 1/2 miles south of the Malibu Pier/Malibu Country Mart and 8 miles north of the Santa Monica Pier. You can walk to shopping and restaurants and beaches while enjoying being enough off the beaten path to relax at will.

The space
Our home not only has shared tennis courts, pool, Jacuzzi and gym, you can also enjoy the latest features in our private theater, often times showing movies still in theaters! This is in a beautiful garden setting on an ocean view property. This is a very quiet, calm and meditative place, though within easy walking distance to where the action is. 2 night limit weekends, short term welcome during the week.

Guest access
Pool, gym, tennis court, theater, fabulous patio and gard
neighborhood_overview:
This neighborhood has everything. The hottest stars live within walking distance and shop at these stores, the best beaches are here and the air is simply better. The water is cleaner up this way too!

A local favorite, Duck and Dive is wonderful for high quality burgers etc and local flare music! Be sure to say "Hi" to the cutie Ryan there!

The Grassy Knoll up by Vintage Market, which has fresh scooped Beachy Creme Ice Cream and is where the Malibu bus ends, is a favorite for local celebrities to try out their acts and has played host to many recently!

Casa Escobar, down by the Malibu pier, is the stop for yummy TexMex and some higher end acts. Lucas Nelson was just there. They have fabulous egg dishes too!

My favorite is a romantic spot looking over the ocean, Geoffrey's. Plan to be there just before sunset so you can see the dolphins who are always swimming by!! Ask for a table along the rail so you have the best ocean views!! This is
host_about: Hi and welcome to Malibu!! We love Malibu and feel very blessed to get to be here. That is part of why we wanted to have this fabulous Malibu Beach cottage to share with family, friends and new friends! We travel a lot and love to entertain. We are executives with a prominent online social media source for the arts, music, movies and fine art. I am here if needed and mostly we want to be sure you enjoy our home and all Malibu has to offer. Thank you for considering our home for your vacation.

host_about: I reside in Venice and I'm referred to as a neighborhood developer. When I purchased the property in 1979, my friends thought I was crazy. Back then, Venice was a high crime, blighted area with little prospect of improvement. Now, everyone says I'm brilliant!. The truth is, I was simply lucky. The one thing I've learned over the years is if you have your choice between smart and lucky, take lucky.

name_left: Modern Mid Century w Panoramic Ocean View and Pool
description:
Used in artistic photoshoots and commercials, this house is the quintessential Malibu mid century gem. Built in 1960, beautifully restored and renovated, with a lush garden and a kidney pool. If you love the modern mid century style with its clean lines and simple esthetic, this is your place to enjoy the original surfing lifestyle of California's beautiful coastline.

The house is solar powered and carbon neutral.

The space
The pool is unheated but gets ok warm in the summer with the sun. It can serve as a great refresher after using the sauna, which is lovely in the evening.

This house combines modern esthetic, relaxed California lifestyle and environmental consciousness.

The house has three bedrooms, two with a king bed, one with a queen. The master bedroom has its own bathroom, the other two bedrooms share a bathroom.

Both bathrooms, the huge living area and the master bedroom have panoramic ocean views. The other t
neighborhood_overview:
In terms of location, this house gives you the best of Malibu and city of LA! Topanga's amazing surf break is just a 5 minute drive. Santa Monica is only 15 minutes away. You are not lost on a remote canyon, but you still get all the benefits of nature likewise.
The house is located on Big Rock, one of the most picturesque neighborhoods in Malibu. Only a 3 minute drive up the hill from PCH, you can feel the calm of nature immediately as you ascend your way up. You completely escape the heavy summer traffic and hurly-burly of inner Malibu, yet you can hear the ocean crash!

We have a fabulous large mobile umbrella for sun protection, and shade while out on the large wood deck. There are teak chairs and padded chaise lounges for your enjoyment

The space
This is a separate unit within a house but has complete privacy and separate entrances into the area and from the area to the beach.
There is a flight of stairs leading down to the property.
Unit is not fit for very young kids; we recommend 6 and up due to the stairs.
The kitchenette consists of a built-in fridge, separate sink, induction stovetop, toaster oven, microwave, coffeemaker, dishwasher, instant-hot, filtered water, toaster, all utensils, and cookware.
This propert

neighborhood_overview:
Malibu is considered to be a extremely expensive area. We are home to a lot of movie stars; in fact we have a Shuttle- Open Air Van that gives tours of our very street.
The famous Malibu Seafood restaurant is a 15- minute walk to dinner. It requires no fuss & kick-off sandals. You- fish n stix!
Malibu has worked hard keeping its natural beauty since its original development. We have a little book that you'll find left for our guest to enjoy, filled with History about Malibu with photos from the early days. You will no doubt fall in love with the Ocean and with Malibu, especially if you stay here on this property.
I did, as I'm absolutely sure you will too. I should let you know one important fact: You will absolutely HATE to pack up and have to leave~~~~
it's sad, but so true!
host_about:
It is really my Love of Malibu & Hosting guest prior to Airbnb that got us started.  

Im happy to Restore &  Repurpose treasures I have come across over the years, all of which is what you’ll find on the property and the interiors of both Bungalows.  

Our Central Courtyard has grown into being a living work of Art that our guest are surprised to find & enjoy year round. 

You'll likely run into Julia, or Luis who assist with everything from Hosting to Repairs.  We all are happy to share a bit about the place...

You'll find me out n about, trying to keep up with my relentless new design idea, or out watering & tending to the gardens.  Always happy to hear about your journey that brings you to Malibu~~~

name_left: Oceanfront Retreat - Perfect for Family Reunions
description:
Hello and welcome to Malibu!

This is comprised of two 3-bed/3-bath townhouses on quiet Malibu Rd. with amazing views. Granite and limestone kitchens & bathrooms, living room with fireplace, spa tub, BBQ on oceanfront deck, 2-car parking, lounge/recreation area with bar, ping-pong and dart board.

A short drive or bike ride to all the great shopping and dining Malibu has to offer. In addition to the beach, there are lots of hiking/biking trails and wine tasting nearby.

The space
You'll love these townhouses as they are spacious, quiet and private with ocean views from every room. They're laid out like houses and the master bedrooms are amazing with huge picture windows that look out to the ocean. And at night, you can see the moon and the stars without even lifting your head off your pillow! There is central air conditioning and heat so you will always be comfortable.

Guest access
The townhouses have keyless entries

MALIBU BEACH HOUSE
THIS STUNNING 6000 SQF VILLA, IS LOCATED IN WORLD FAMOUS ZUMA BEACH,ONE OF THE MOST DESIRABLE OCEAN FRONT LOCATIONS & FAVORITE SURFING SPOT WITH DIRECT BEACH ACCESS & WHITE WATER VIEWS.

We are 1 mile up from the oceans edge, sunny little one room guesthouse. Outdoor shower, kitchen, pool, Jacuzzi. ocean and mountain views, .5 bath is in the main house close to the door so social distancing is very do able. Minutes to beaches, wine country, and hiking. This tiny house comes complete with stunning ocean and canyon views. It is perched at the edge of a canyon and is perfect for nature lovers. Wake up to the sounds of birds, parrots and horses. It has a queen sized bed with down comforter and lots of pillows. There is a small table for eating or working on your laptop.(We have wifi.) In the tiny house are also a mini fridge and Keurig coffee maker. We will provide coffee tea and all the fixens'. There is a flat screen TV were you can watch Netflix. neighborhood_overview: By car, are are just minutes  from the nearest beaches. The Santa Monica mountains also offer myriad of hiking and biking options as well as world class wineries. There are several  wine tour operators to show you around. Car and Motor cycle enthusiast will love driving the winding mountain roads and the famous Mullholand highway. We have many dinning options nearby. Malibu Colony is just a few miles up the road where you can pass the day shopping and star gazing. Pepperdine University, the Getty Museum and the MASH filming site are local destinations.

Stay at our newly listed "Bu "Seaside Cabin". We recently restored this 2 bedroom, 1.5 bath 1970's vintage Malibu mobile home unit into a seaside and nature lovers escape! Enjoy the best of Malibu's beaches and mountains from this sweet spot.

Note: please read house rules in detail before booking. Booking a reservation means you will respect the rules of staying at this property.

The space
Stay at an historic "old malibu" resort property. Enjoy tennis and private hiking trails on this 100 acre private retreat. The beach is a short walk across PCH. Guest access
Entire unit, private hiking trails, sycamore groves and tennis courts.

I'm a Sports Registered Dietitian by profession and Vice President of a non-profit land trust in Malibu. Ask me about the best nearby dining, farmer's market, arts, culture, sightseeing in Malibu and beyond. 

As a host, we will get you settled in and stay out of your way during your stay. We are just a phone call away if you have a question or need our assistance.

The beach house is the closest to the beach in all of Malibu.

This gated compound features a bluff house, pool house, and beach house, allowing ultimate privacy for up to three families. The bluff house is nestled among trees and is surrounded by sundecks. It features a chefs' kitchen, grand salon with massive 152" TV, indoor/outdoor master bedroom suite that spills out into a sundeck, sauna, laundry room, fireplace, guest bathroom and office.

neighborhood_overview:
Prime Malibu Road location. Private beach and private beach access.

Malibu is considered to be a extremely expensive area. We are home to a lot of movie stars; in fact we have a Shuttle- Open Air Van that gives tours of our very street.
The famous Malibu Seafood restaurant is a 15- minute walk to dinner. It requires no fuss & kick-off sandals. You- fish n stix!
Malibu has worked hard keeping its natural beauty since its original development. We have a little book that you'll find left for our guest to enjoy, filled with History about Malibu with photos from the early days. You will no doubt fall in love with the Ocean and with Malibu, especially if you stay here on this property.
I did, as I'm absolutely sure you will too. I should let you know one important fact: You will absolutely HATE to pack up and have to leave~~~~
it's sad, but so true!

The front yard , heated pool, jacuzzi, and five separate deck areas all overlook the breathtaking unobstructed panoramic view of ocean from Little Dume to Big Dume. Walk or bike to Zuma and Broadbeach, restaurants and shops, exclusive canyon and State Park. Ideal for athletes and writers, romancers and relaxers.

Surrounded by lus

Frogs sometimes sing at night, chicken rarely make noise  in morning, no rooster. Best property in neighborhood. Daily sound of horses and chickens.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.

    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

name_left: The Perfect Malibu Sandy Beachfront Villa
description:
This property is professional managed exclusively by Stay Awhile Villas.

Breath Malibu and set yourself apart from the rest at The La Costa Beach House beachfront luxury villa in Malibu. Surrounded by the earths natural beauty, inspired by a beach chic lifestyle and a reflection of Malibu this spectacular villa is your place to unwind in a luxurious setting. Wake up to the sound of ocean waves breathing in clean air while the warm California sun tickles your face. Create memories that will last a lifetime and make The La Costa Beach House a part of your journey.

The space
Through the private gated entryway, enter a storied world of stunning natural surroundings and exquisite attention to detail. The residence opens to a spectacular beachfront deck with loungers, al-fresco dining for six and steps down to the sand. If the breeze off the water gets chilly in the evening step inside and relax by the Apple TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi or sip a Californ
neighborhood_overview:
While Malibu offers some absolutely stunning beaches, and one just outside your door, there are other activities available should you wish to see a different side of the area. For instance, you may either take a hike or a safari on the grounds of the Saddlerock Ranch Estate, with wine tasting at the end. Visit the impressive Getty Villa Museum or the Adamson House with its amazing views of the Malibu Pier. As for restaurants, the world famous Nobu Malibu is just down the PCH.

The La Costa Beach House is a spectacular property in a spectacular setting that will provide immeasurable memories of Malibu and the Pacific Ocean. Book it today.

1.2 Miles South of Nobu
1.5 Miles South of the Malibu Country Mart
host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

Breathtaking view of the Pacific Ocean. This quiet beach condo is located on beach side of Pacific Coast Highway, in
neighborhood_overview: Malibu is a beach city in Los Angeles County, California, situated 30 miles (48 km) west of Downtown Los Angeles. Known for its Mediterranean climate, "21 miles (34 km) of scenic beauty" strip of the Malibu coast incorporated in 1991. The area is known for being the home of Hollywood movie stars, people in the entertainment industry, and other affluent residents. Most Malibu residents live within a few hundred yards of Pacific Coast Highway (State Route 1), which traverses the city, with some residents living up to a mile away from the beach up narrow canyons.

The space
Located on the sands of Carbon Beach, this beautiful beachfront Bungalow has sunrise to sunset panoramic views from Santa Monica to the Malibu Pier and beyond. The living area and private deck provide a pristine front-row seat to watch the waves, surfers, and sailboats.

The best restaurants and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance as are movie theaters, the historical Adamson House, water sports and the world famous Surfrider Beach… And when you're ready to take a break from the beach, just minutes away you'll find some of the best hiking and biking in Southern California in the parks of the Santa Monica Mountains.

A lovely one bedroom/one bath bungalow beautifully furnished with king bed and down bedding, queen size pull ou
neighborhood_overview: An affluent beach town west of downtown Los Angeles, Malibu consists of 27-miles of prime Pacific coastline. The community is famous for its warm, sandy beaches which include Surfrider, Zuma, Malibu, Topanga and Point Dume to name just a few. The best restaurants, Whole Foods Market, and shopping in Malibu are within easy walking distance. As is the Malibu Pier, the historical Adamson house, water sports, and the world-famous Surfrider Beach…  With a short car ride, you will find some of the best hiking and biking in the Santa Monica Mountains.

Amazing location giving you the feeling you're away from the crazy busy big cities but super close if you need them. Only steps away from Moonshadows (fantastic restaurant/bar on the water) and Duke's restaurant on the water just up the beach, great brunch! World famous Nobu and the Malibu Pier await only few minutes north.

15 minutes from Santa Monica and the incredible Santa Monica pier, 10 minutes from Malibu town center. 5-10 minutes to the Getty Villa, which is an amazing museum (formerly the home of J. Paul Getty once the world's richest man!) that overlooks the ocean and only 30-40 minutes from LAX.

Two kitchens, two dining areas, and multiple living rooms give you and your friends plenty of room to create amazing memories. Throw a record on the player and enjoy a meal at the stone dining table or curl up and savor a book in one of the cozy basket swing chairs. name_left: Perfect Malibu Get Away Cottage, 1/2 blk to ocean
description:
Wonderful and very rare original 1922 Malibu Beach Cottage. Uniquely located such that you can see the ocean from the front yard. You can easily walk across the street to world famous Duke’s of Malibu restaurant or around the corner to the local favorite hamburger/burrito stand, dive shop, post office, hardware store and local shopping! Walk 1 mile down the sidewalk and you are at Billionaire beach and can walk the beach down to Nobu or Soho house and hob nob with the billionaires, if you like.

The space
The very rare 1922 cottage is a cozy, updated, relaxing place to hide from the world. It is perfect for single travelers wanting a private space, couples, pairs of couples, lady’s get aways and small families. With excellent wifi, 200/200, close proximity to Santa Monica, only 9 miles, and desk in each bedroom, the cottage also makes the ideal place for the business traveler(s).

Wonderfully located by 3 supposed world class restaurants including Mas
neighborhood_overview:
This is one of the most amazing properties in Malibu because it is not only very close to the ocean, it is one of the original Malibu properties and it is in the heart of what was originally the main area of Malibu. It is about as original surf community as you can get. The original shopping area for Malibu is just around the corner, a 2 minute walk. There you will still find shopping, the post office, dive shop and the best breakfast burritos in town! Across the very busy street, aka PCH, you will find world famous Duke’s restaurant. If you are here on a Tuesday, be sure to check out taco Tuesday at Duke’s! This is the same Duke’s that originated in Hawaii! There is also a gas station/food stop and Ace Hardware Store along this same strip.

1 mile west is the start of Billionaire Beach which wraps around to the Malibu Pier which is one of my favorite places, including Casa Escobar located in the old Malibu Inn building. There are many access points to the beach nearby and w
host_about: Hi and welcome to Malibu!! We love Malibu and feel very blessed to get to be here. That is part of why we wanted to have this fabulous Malibu Beach cottage to share with family, friends and new friends! We travel a lot and love to entertain. We are executives with a prominent online social media source for the arts, music, movies and fine art. I am here if needed and mostly we want to be sure you enjoy our home and all Malibu has to offer. Thank you for considering our home for your vacation.

The condo is also on the market for sale.

description:
Our home is a very spacious Townhouse in a gated community in Malibu. The neighborhood is very quiet. So it's perfect to work from home, relax and improve your lifestyle. neighborhood_overview:
We are inland of the very special Point Dume neighborhood. It is a wonderful space with nature all around it. It's possible to walk, run or bike from the house to Point Dume or up Zumirez and see the ocean. It's spectacular. A 4 minutes drive can take you to Zuma Westward and Point Dume beaches. It's a dream.
Pavilions, Cafe de la Plage and Olie's Duck Dive restaurant are 5 minutes away by car. Very convenient.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

name_left: Soaring view overlooking Carbon Beach.
description:
360 degrees of beauty.

This California Ranch Style home sits overlooking the Pacific Ocean, nestled in the majestic Santa Monica Mountains and is ideal for relaxing, entertaining or a romantic getaway. It has a stunning contemporary kitchen with an open floor plan and endless places to lounge and take in the views. The house is ideally located just five minutes to Carbon Beach and less than 10 minutes from world-class Malibu Pier, restaurants, incomparable shopping, markets and cafes.

The space
The house is not only beautiful but extremely comfortable and well appointed, including chef's kitchen, high-quality bedding, Nespresso coffee, 4 HD TVs with Apple TV, FIOS internet and so much more.

Guest access
Entire home (minus garage) with ample private driveway parking.

Other things to note
We are pet friendly and subject to approval upon request. There is a nightly pet fee of $60.
neighborhood_overview: After traveling around the world we have come to the realization that there may not be a more beautiful and dynamic place to live than here. Sitting on the deck looking out at the ocean, one feels a million miles away from civilization. However we are close enough to be in Santa Monica in 20 minutes, Beverly Hills in 30 and the airport in 45.  Not to mention we are 10 minutes from Malibu Pier and some of the best beaches in the world. Our neighborhood is highly coveted for all these reasons, it's truly one of the best spots in Eastern Malibu.
host_about: My husband and I are both artists and have lived in the Santa Monica Mountains for most of our lives. We love the beach, hills, and tranquil beauty of Malibu. We have travelled around the world and always find that right here in Malibu is about as good as it gets.

Best location in Malibu, amongst celebrities, just minutes walking distance away from famous Westward and Zuma beaches. Enter the Gated Spanish style beachside home with sweeping panoramic Ocean and Mountain Views. Brand new designer furniture and artwork around the entire house. Large windows and glass doors around the entire house perfect for capturing the magnificent picture perfect views. New 4K smart TVs w/ Netflix and over 500 channels.

The space
Jaw dropping sweeping panoramic ocean views as well as mountain and canyons views. This home is perfectly situated at the heart of prime Point Dume. Enjoy the essence of beachside living, listen to the ocean waves crash at nights. Just 20 minutes away from Santa Monica pier and 3rd street promenade.

Just minutes away from Westward and Zuma beaches. Located on the top of one of the most exclusive Malibu mountains. Enter our beautiful vacation home with magnificent views of the Pacific Ocean. Enjoy the oce
host_about:
Hi I’m Yervant an airbnb Superhost. I pride myself on excellence and attention to detail. I love sharing my home to my fellow travelers. I spend most of my time traveling the world myself and have come to realize there are a few things which make a trip great. I have implemented all I have learned over the years of traveling into hosting. 

My favorite destinations are Spain, Greece and China. 

A few things I like to do during my spare time are hiking, surfing, snowboarding and playing soccer.

name_left: Private Malibu View Cottage Best Location Sleeps 7
description:
Charming and private stand alone cottage with peek-a-boo ocean views in quiet residential neighborhood, with an amazing location and off street parking. Close to Pepperdine, Malibu Pier, Surfrider Beach, parks, the new Whole Foods and all local amenities.

The space
Clean, charming stand-alone guest cottage with peek-a-boo ocean views. Room for family & friends and an outdoor back deck area with lovely mountain views & seating for 6. This front house shares a lot with a stand-alone back cottage which is sited approximately 40 feet behind this home.

Other things to note
We ask that you please be courteous of the surrounding area and neighbors, along with any guests who might be occupying back house during your stay. All noise levels to drop after 9:30 pm. We ask that you please inquire about our Pet Policy, and to provide the breed and weight of the animal prior to booking. Thank you for your cooperation.
neighborhood_overview: Beautiful views in a quiet and serene walking neighborhood. Less than 5 minutes to everything- local area beaches, shopping and entertainment.
host_about:
Happy, outgoing, family oriented individual. 
I've lived on the West Coast most of my life (Vancouver, BC, San Diego, CA, Tiburon, CA & Malibu, CA) and over a year in Australia.
As a guest, my family and I are very respectful and treat other peoples homes as we'd treat our own.
As a host, I'm happy to help in any way or leave you alone and respect your privacy.

name_left: Malibu Beachfront Luxury Condo | 4 ppl
description:
Breathtaking ocean view beach house in Malibu. Your perfect peaceful ocean escape. This condo opens up to the Pacific ocean sights and sounds. You will catch dolphins and birds daily and few whales !

Comfortable Malibu address right on Pacific Highway! A few doors down from Moonshadows Restaurant & Lounge Bar and 5 minute drive from famouse NOBU Restaurant.

The space
Unobstructed ocean views from the living room, dining room/kitchen, and the bedroom. It's gorgeous here...and we'd love to have you!
Recently renovated one bedroom house right on the Malibu Beach with great privacy and space. Daily dolphin shows and occasionally whales. Listen to the calming sound of the ocean. Private access to the beach right under the unit.

Inside is very nicely equipped with a modern fit and finish throughout. It has a full service kitchen with electric range/oven, fridge freezer and a microwave. Full size double bed for two. Closet/wardrobe.
neighborhood_overview:
Featuresexpensive · beaches · pacific coast highway · john fante · famous actors · celebrities
Zara’s place is located in Malibu, California, United States.
5 -10 minutes walk to "Moonshadows" and "Duke's" restaurants.
5 minutes drive to Shops and groceries stores, The Getty Villa Art Museum and Malibu Beach.
host_about: Hello everyone I'm Zaza. It's my pleasure to welcome you in the magic city of LA!

name_left: An Ocean  Paradise
description:
A beautiful open plan zen water front home overlooking the ocean located on Pacific Coast Highway and half. mike from Moonshadows Resturant.

The space
You will be on one floor. Kitchen has Miele appliances, with most gadgets needed for a functioning kitchen like crockpots, air fryers rice cookers etc. Includes dinnerware, wine/champagne, shot and most beverage glasses. Fully equipped lit glass bar and dining area. Two full bathrooms, with Toto toilets (bidet/heated) , rain shower heads and handheld showers. Accordion /collapsible doors to the deck bringing the outdoors in. Large turquoise blue deck overlooking the ocean with clear glass fencing. A truly zen retreat and sits on a hidden surfing spot Big Rock Beach. Due to COVID health restrictions, we are currently not taking bookings for any gatherings or parties.

Guest access
Guests can access all areas of the property and the house has a stone staircase leading you straight onto the b
neighborhood_overview: Minutes from Mastro Ocean Club and 0.6 miles from Moonshadows. We are fortunate to have more privacy due to having no neighbors on one side of the home.
host_about:
Welcoming people to my home is what I love and having the “we loved it” comment is what really rewards me. I try to encourage guests to ask as many questions before their stay so that we align your expectations with what we can realistically provide. 
My motto: “There’s no better payment than happy guests”.  I try to make my home cozy, comfortable, and a touch of zen so that’s you feel  like it’s “a home away from home” that needs little work with more emphasis on relaxation and fun times with your friends or family.

name_left: Malibu Ocean View Contemporary Ranch Home
description:
Malibu contemporary modern beach ranch facing Zuma beach surf heaven and minutes to walking or mountain bike trails. A perfect get away to experience Malibu living at its best.

The space
The open plan layout of the house flows seamlessly from inside living spaces to the outdoor setting exposed to extraordinary 180 degree views from Point Dume to The Santa Barbara Chanel Islands. Our home has been completely remodeled to the last detail inside and out and includes a Wolf gourmet kitchen layout with marble counters and a host of design icon furniture pieces.

Guest access
The entire house is open to our guests including the laundry.
The additional contemporary sheds may be used upon request for an additional fee as well as the Bambi Airstream which is parked on the property.
The home is located on a flag lot which shares the driveway access to the side of the house.

Other things to note
The BBQ and wooden Hott
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the hill side of Malibu Park our home faces unobstructed views of the Ocean and a few minutes to some of the best trails in Malibu.
NOTE - It is important to know that the area was devastated during the Woolsey Fires on November 2018. Many homes in the neighborhood were completely destroyed and sit as empty lots. The clean up is complete and the vegetation has grown back to its pristine look. Some construction will be heard on most days due to the rebuilding of homes.
host_about: No mud no lotus :)

The space
This is a great space for families or couples. It is not appropriate for loud parties or events.

name_left: Rockpoint by AvantStay | Beachfront Home w/ Ocean Views & Private Beach Access
description:
Welcome to Rockpoint, an AvantStay home!

Embrace the quintessential California character of this beachfront home that rests on the rocky shores of the Pacific Ocean. Experience jaw-dropping sunset views and the ambiance of waves crashing upon the shore. Glass sliding doors open to a full-width balcony that features a grill and outdoor dining setup, the perfect setting for toasting one of Malibu's finest wines. The interior boasts a bright and homey coastal vibe with a plethora of light that encapsulates the home.

Nearby Activities: Malibu Wine Safari, Malibu Creek State Park (Biking, Hiking, Swimming, Kayaking), Rosenthal Winery (Wine Bar, Live Music, Food Trucks), Neptunes Net (Fish and Chips), Will Rodgers State Beach (Volleyball).

Parking Details:
1 car garage.
​​​​​​​1 car will fit in front of the garage.

This home comes with a pack n' play travel crib available. A high chair can be provided upon request with at least 24hrs adv
host_about:
Beautiful spaces in spectacular destinations for your next group vacation, retreat, or getaway #GoTogetherGoFar

Experience an AvantStay. Find us in San Diego, Tahoe, Palm Springs, Malibu, Venice, Temecula, Paso Robles, Orange County, Bend, and Scottsdale.

name_left: Cliffridge by AvantStay | Lush Malibu Hills Estate w/ Breathtaking Ocean Views
description:
Welcome to Cliffridge, an AvantStay home!

This hilltop home features panoramic ocean views up and down the California coast. An open living room, family room, and dining area with soaring wood beam vaulted ceilings adorn the home. Enjoy the Pacific Ocean views from almost every room in this beautiful oasis. This abode features an in-ground spa, a pool table, a fireplace, and even a Pacman Arcade game. Spend your time building sandcastles and riding your boogie board at El Matador State Beach, located 3 minutes from your estate. Get caught in Neptunes Net for a fresh Seafood dinner. Finish nights toasting to the stars from your patio.

Parking Details:
4 spots max at the top of driveway.
2 car garage.

name_left: Private Malibu Retreat
description:
Stay at a private guest cottage on a secluded nature preserve and old resort property in Western Malibu. The nearest pocket beach, across P.C.H is a 5 minute walk. Enjoy azure blue ocean views and the sights and sounds of nature from this special sanctuary. *The property is owned and managed by a non-profit organization who aims to protect and preserve natural habitat areas in the local mountains. Your stay supports ongoing Woolsey Fire recovery and continued stewardship of this land.*

The space
Stay at this one of a kind nature retreat. Enjoy a spacious, airy and light filled home surrounded by majestic Sycamore trees. We provide all essentials for a comfortable and enjoyable stay, including beach equipment. Enjoy your morning coffee or sunset meal with ocean breezes at one of several outdoor seating areas.
*This house is the only surviving guest unit after the Woolsey Fire ravaged the property grounds. Much care, time and resources have been put into re
neighborhood_overview: We are located on the Western end of Malibu. This area is best known for it's natural beauty, tranquility and "old Malibu" feel. This stretch of P.C.H boasts the best pocket beaches and scenic hiking trails to explore. The nearest coffee shop, grocery and shopping is a 5 minute drive. We are 13 miles from the pier and "downtown" Malibu. This location is best suited for guests that love nature and desire rest and relaxation away from the crowds and clamor of the city.
host_about:
I'm a 36yr old professional that lives and works in Malibu. I spend most of my time outdoors: running, mountain biking and hiking. I'm a Sports Registered Dietitian by profession and Vice President of a non-profit land trust in Malibu. Ask me about the best nearby dining, farmer's market, arts, culture, sightseeing in Malibu and beyond. 

As a host, we will get you settled in and stay out of your way during your stay. We are just a phone call away if you have a question or need our assistance.

name_left: Cozy Hideaway at The M Malibu
description:
A modern take on the California life style, this room is the perfect way to enjoy a sweet escape. Situated on the ground floor, it is the only room without a balcony, yet the space offers a quiet and cozy experience for the perfect relaxation. The room features a Queen size bed and hand selected materials to ensure a luxurious experience after a day at the beach or enjoying local Malibu activities. Enjoy complimentary Nespresso and Boxed Water to enhance your stay with us!

The space
Clean and simple, this is the perfect place to relax after hanging at the beach, enjoying local shops and restaurants, hiking, or enjoying the local wineries. Just across the street from public beach access, and steps away from the Malibu Pier, this is the perfect place to escape for the weekend and enjoy Malibu.
Your room will include:
Free WiFi
Flat-screen TV
Mini-fridge
Minibar with complimentary Nespresso
Complimentary Boxed Water
Luxe bath ame
neighborhood_overview: Across the street from public beach access, 5 minutes from the Malibu Pier and Surfrider Beach, and a 5 minute drive to local shops and restaurants. There are hiking trails and wine tasting rooms near by.

Welcome to Sebastian, an AvantStay home!

Relax and unwind in this exquisitely inviting Californian home flooded with views of the Pacific Ocean. This bright and charming home offers a spacious interior with beautiful wood finishes throughout and a deck that expands the width of the exterior. Only a five minute walk across the street to Lechuza Beach!

neighborhood_overview:
A few steps out of the front door and you’ll find world-class dining, shopping and hiking. The home is just a short walk to Starbucks and Vintage Grocers. 10 miles of serene hiking trails, high peaks, horse riding trails, and serene brooks. Malibu is also home to some of the finest spots for surfing and dolphins and whales have been spotted off the coast from the balconies of this home.
A quick drive to the Trancas Country Market will offer you a wide variety of gourmet options to cook up a chef quality meal or grab a healthy snack. At the market, grab a Starbucks coffee; treat yourself to a fragrant bouquet of flowers from the flower shop, or some beachwear from the surf shop. If you’re interested in experiencing the luxury lifestyle of Malibu, dine out in some of Malibu’s finest restaurants along the coast which are close by: NoBu, Malibu Café, Cafe HaBana, Coral Cantina, Geoffrey’s, Malibu Farm, Malibu Seafood Fresh Fish Market and Patio Café, Mangia, Neptune’s Net, Zooma Sushi

Super unique guest house on two acres. The space is completely remolded and perfect for a serene weekend, or beach get away. I'm directly across the street from one of Malibu's best beaches. Hike, mountain bike, or relax in the beautiful space.
Private and gated, and close to the best restaurants. Walk to the beach, or stay and enjoy the beautiful surroundings.

I now offer guided hikes in the Santa Monica Mountains, as well as Western horseback riding for all levels. You may gather fresh eggs in the mornings, and join in for pottery, Capoeira, and Slack Line training. Lots to do, or just relax and enjoy nature and the beach.

The space
This tranquil suite with private outside entrance is located inside our estate on Point Dume, one of Malibu's most exclusive neighborhoods, where you’re only 3 minutes from famous beaches, shops, cafés and restaurants. The room features a Queen size bed covered in soft linen, down comforter (duvet) and pillows, private bathroom with tub, small walk-in closet, large dresser, small refrigerator, sitting area, wireless internet, workstation for your laptop, coffee & tea bar, and 16x9 flat screen TV with Directv(Satellite). The double french doors and windows have exquisite garden and pool views, and also allow for complete privacy to come and go as you please. The room is large enou
neighborhood_overview: We are located in the prestigious neighborhood of Point Dume, home to many famous movie and TV stars. Unlike many other neighborhoods in Malibu you're close to everything you might need, all within a 2 to 3 minute walking distance. Not only will you be staying in a private gated estate that is conveniently located near a large grocery store (with Starbucks inside!), restaurants, cafe's, shops, hair salon, yoga studio, pharmacy & more, but another minute down the road at the corner of PCH and Heathercliff is the bus stop where you have access to all the other fabulous Malibu destinations, all without needing a car. Or venture even further on the bus and visit Pacific Palasades, Santa Monica, Venice and Los Angeles! Or hire an Uber, there's plenty available! You can easily access famous Zuma Beach and Westward Beach by bus or car which is only 2 minutes down PCH, or a 15-20 minute walk.

The home boasts 4 bedrooms with sleeping arrangements for a total of 12 guests if needed. We offer our guests more than just the home, we also supply
neighborhood_overview: Home is in an exclusive private guard gated neighborhood located near the Malibu Country Mart in Malibu California.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

*PRICE IS FIXED. PLEASE DO NOT OFFER A LOWER PRICE.

It
neighborhood_overview:
The Malibu Neighborhood is extremely beautiful and exclusive.
The estate is 15 minutes from Santa Monica, 2 minute to Pacific Coast Highway(HWY1), and 5 minutes to the Malibu Soho House or NOBU. You will find many well established & well known individuals living amongst you. Please be kind and treat everyone the way you would like to be treated. The house is in the Malibu mountains off Pacific coast HWY in an extremely safe and gated community that has gates & guards on duty 24/7. Nobu, SoHo House as well as many other restaurants are all within ten minutes from the estate. The Malibu Country Market is also close by located 12 minutes away from the estate off Pacific Coast HWY. Here you will find every store imaginable and will be able to full-fill all your shopping needs. You will find more great restaurants like; Neptuns Net, Geoffrey's, Tra-Di-Noi, Mastros Ocean Club, and Sunset Cafe. Please message me with any questions or inquiries you may have.

All the best & kind regards,

David

neighborhood_overview:
Our place is located in Malibu, California, United States.
This beach house is ideally located in the sandiest section of the Big Rock area of Malibu. Its location allows both quick and easy access to Santa Monica and the greater LA as well as also being just minutes from Nobu, the Malibu Pier, downtown Malibu, and Pacific Palisades.
The Big Rock area is unique and our stretch of beach is wet/dry and has the largest beach in the area. Views from this property include seals basking near Big Rock, dolphins, fish in the surf and Queen's necklace views.
This Malibu Beach home is ideally located approximately 45 minutes from LAX, 20 minutes from Santa Monica and just a few minutes to Nobu, Malibu Pier and downtown Malibu.
host_about:
Originally from Allentown, Pennsylvania I was always drawn to the local streams and lakes to fish and enjoyed camping in the Poconos. The annual vacation to a cabin on the bay in Truro, Cape Cod, Massachusetts and occasional visits to the New Jersey beaches were always fun.  
We've always enjoyed California and fell in love with Malibu. The coast, the weather and the wildlife is awesome. We especially like East Malibu as within 20-30 minutes you're in the best civilization has to offer.
We enjoyed upgrading this property, and really enjoy the great local people we have met. The people who help maintain and clean the property are special and it's nice to be able to create opportunity for them while opening up our property for others to enjoy the property and the area the same way we do!

neighborhood_overview: Nestled atop a 3-acre plot at the end of a private road in a quiet area, this expansive residence is an easy 10-minute drive from Nobu and 30 minutes from the Santa Monica Pier.
host_about:
Welcome to Open Air Homes!  We have been hosting short term rentals for the past 7 years and have always been obsessed with the customer experience.  Your experience.   Open Air Homes is design driven, hospitality focused and always looking to create comfortable experiences for you and your families.   We believe that a high end rental experience starts with the amenities of a hotel along with the conveniences of a home. 

-The Open Air ECOSYSTEM OF COMPANIES-

At Open Air, we continue to reimagine the future of home ownership with our homeowner partners.  A significant number of our former guests have purchased homes and have asked us to help manage and monetize their property while they travel.  We handle every aspect of the property maintenance and management, while ensuring a top of class hospitality experience for all guests in the home. 

-Open Air Design by Interior Particulier-

We have an average of 4.9 stars across our portfolio of homes due to our steadfast commitment to design.  Open Air Design by Interior Particulier believes that great design can happen at a wide variety of price points, and we are here to help our homeowner partners with all of their design needs to set their home up for success in a crowded rental market. 

-Open Air Developments-

At Open Air Developments, we are currently in development of four exciting projects in Los Angeles.  Our flip projects range from small home flips to large scale redevelopments with well established architects. 

-OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman-

OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman, a licensed brokerage, is here to help you find your dream home.  Whether you're looking for an investment property, vacation home, or a long term rental property, our team of agents can help.  CA DRE License (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name_left: OCEANFRONT STAYCATION SLEEPS 10
description:
STAYCATION! LOOK NO FURTHER! This is your quintessential beach pad. Our mid-century modern retreat is right on one of the most spectacular coastlines in Malibu on Zuma Beach. This 3,000 sq. ft., open-concept home offers true inside-outside California living. Wall to wall sliding glass doors in every room open to a wraparound deck, for maximum viewing of whales, dolphins, and tide pools of the sparkling Pacific beyond.

The space
If you're in the mood to wake up to the sound of waves crashing on the shore, sip coffee while watching dolphins splash in the waves, take a stroll or run along the coastline, watch your kids build sand castles, boogie board, surf, hike, sip wine at sunset.... Just to mention a few, THIS HOUSE IS FOR YOU! You'll be living the dream while soaking up the sun on your oceanfront deck and as night falls, sitting by the fire making smores or just star gazing.

Guest access
Guests have access to entire house.
neighborhood_overview: This house is located directly across the street from a Starbucks, Wells Fargo bank, a gourmet super market, and lots of stores to shop around in.   Theres even a great surf store for lessons, clothing, etc...   Just down the road 10-15 minutes is the famous Malibu Pier and surfing beach, Pepperdine University, Malibu Country Mart, and the Getty Villa.  Santa Monica is 15 miles south, the Grove 32 miles, Universal Studios 40 miles, and Disneyland is 62 miles away.
host_about: Just an easy-going yogi. I like to exercise,  eat healthy, and laugh with friends and family.  My 2 dogs and daughter are the center of my world!  I feel so blessed to be able to share my beautiful beach places, in the city I grew up in and lived my entire life, with you.

name_left: Beachside studio apartment for Two
description:
*Please Read the Entire Listing Before Booking*
Breathe California and immerse yourself in Malibu's majestic beauty at SA Suites on Carbon. An intimate collection of 11 ocean view suites thoughtfully curated for those seeking a quiet retreat on California's most sought after beach. A peaceful and serene reserve for the discerning guest who values tranquility and luxury. Reconnect, relax and rejoice in Malibu. Beautiful sunsets, ocean waves and star-lit nights await you. Coastal living at its best.

The space
Suite #2 - Quality construction and remarkable ocean views come standard. This studio suite has a king size bed fully outfitted with luxurious linens and our favorite down comforter. High quality finishes include Toto Neorest 700 Dual Flush Bidet, glass framed showers with a Graff rain shower, and perfectly lit LED vanity. Nespresso Vertuo coffee machine with pods, Apple TV, High Speed Internet and AC. Apple TV on every TV. High Speed internet and A
neighborhood_overview:
Dubbed "Billionaire's Beach" by locals Carbon Beach has become one of the most popular and requested beaches in Malibu. Known for its long sandy beaches makes Carbon perfect for long walks on the beach, paddle boarding, kayaking, swimming and sunbathing. Guests are seconds away from the sand.
Steps away from Nobu and SoHo House and seconds from the sand. You can walk to surfrider beach and the Malibu Pier. Walk to the Country Mart and experience the best restaurants and shops Malibu has to offer. New center for grocery shopping with new shops opening everyday.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

We rent only to responsible guests who want the best of Malibu in a quiet, quality environment. Accordingly, we do ask our guests to provide a description of themselves and their party in terms of profession and backgrounds.

Everything about this home is top of the line, first class and immaculately clean. Completed in 2020, this beach front residence sits directly on the Pacific Ocean with with no neighbors and a private sandy cove.

The space
This new and never lived in before beach house is the only house in the east end of Malibu on the beach with no neighbors and a private sandy cove. The entry floor features the living room with stunning finishes, fireplace, pocket sliding doors & ocean front patio, the dining room on the water & custom kitchen with high end finishes & a floor to ceiling glass wine display. Thehe master bedroom with beautifully designed bathroom & freestanding tub, expa
neighborhood_overview:
If you’re in pursuit of adventure, step out of your back door to play in the surf, walk along the beach, or watch for whales and dolphins from the comfort of your chaise lounge. Malibu also has world-class dining, shopping and hiking.

Day trips are easy. Whether you feel like driving to Santa Barbara for the day, or hanging out on the boardwalk in Venice, walking on the Promenade in Santa Monica, bringing the kids to Universal Studios, or visiting the Hollywood Walk of Fame. The house is situated only minutes from Pepperdine University, and easy access to UCLA and USC, the 10, 405 and Los Angeles airport.

name_left: Malibu Private Townhouse with 3 bicycles included
description:
Come visit Malibu to wind down or have an adventure. This private townhouse is the perfect place to enjoy local restaurants, beaches and scenery. It’s only a 2-minute bike ride to Point Dume and Paradise Cove! This property features 2 bedrooms with the loft in the guest room, 1.5 bathrooms, high ceilings, in-unit washer & dryer, 3 bicycles, and 2-car garage. Amenities include a large pool and additional laundry for a fee. We can easily accommodate 4 guests in bedrooms.

The space
It’s a beach town within minutes from the most famous beaches where one can surf the waves or relax in the sun. It is a prime destination for hikers and bikers in Santa Monica mountains. Malibu is the sanctuary city with incredible nature where you can see dolphins almost every day and gray whales during Whale Watching Season. Come enjoy the tranquility of wonderful Malibu! We will provide 3 bikes to enjoy the Pacific Coast Highway view and drive along the ocean. WOW!!!

description:
Light, bright, and right on the sand, this modern 3 bed/ 3 bath home is located on the coveted Malibu Road. Enjoy the crystal blue ocean view through floor-to-ceiling glass doors. Or leave them wide open to the salty breezes. Sunbathe and BBQ on your own private patio, where you’ll hear the water rushing below. And when the tide is low, step out onto the sand for a long walk along the California coast.

The space
Designer-decorated and immaculately kept, this stunning beachfront unit is freshly remodeled and centrally located in the heart of Malibu. You’ll have a private entrance and patio, and access to the onsite kayaks, surf, boogie and paddle boards!

Guest access
