name_left: Malibu Guest Suite Walking Distance to the Beach
description:
Breezy Malibu suite with private entrance. Stay close to the city, in the peace of Malibu.

Our guest suite comprises one half of our 60s-style home.

Enjoy coffee in your private atrium, then take a 7-min stroll to the ocean, beach chairs and towels provided.

A hotel alternative -- features mini fridge, toaster, coffee and kettle. No microwave, we hate their harsh waves!

Smart TV with all streaming apps.

Overnight street parking in an idyllic, security patrolled neighborhood.
neighborhood_overview: Sunset Mesa is a special, idyllic Malibu neighborhood close to the city. We love that all the houses here were made in the 60s and that you catch ocean views when walking around the neighborhood.

Majestic 4400 sq.ft. estate bordering hundreds of acres of pristine parkland. Stunning ocean views, Catalina Island, city lights & expansive mountain vistas. Viking stainless steel chef's kitchen opens to a comfortable living area with a decorative stone fireplace, and breakfast nook w/ triple bay windows overlooking the ocean.

The perfect escape with a private yard, hot tub, and saltwater infinity pool. High-end furnishings and luxury amenities, cozy movie room with a large projector screen.

The space
Enjoy expansive city views through floor to ceiling glass sliding doors and windows.

name_left: Serene Retreat in the Mountains with Private Trail
description:
Private scenic retreat nestled in Topanga Canyon. Wake up to beautiful sunrises, birds chirping and a peaceful retreat. This 1 bedroom, 1 bath is located near the ranches. Perfect for a getaway and still close to the city. Fresh air and natural vibrations to soothe the soul.

The space
Guests have access to the front entrance of the house with private parking, a private trail with a scenic lookout, bbq grill and front patio!

Guest access
Front yard of the property.

name_left: Modern mountain getaway in Topanga Canyon
description:
Newly renovated + super private modern lower level duplex, with large fenced in yard - pets welcome! Stunning panoramic views! Home is fully furnished and includes - 2 bedrooms , 2 full bathrooms, full kitchen with dishwasher, laundry room with washer + dryer, loft office space, outdoor deck w/charcoal grill. Plenty of street parking. 5 Minutes drive to Tuna Canyon, 15 min drive to the beach and 25min to Santa Monica down the iconic Pacific Coast Highway.

The space
Situated in one of the most desirable micro climates in Topanga Canyon - Fernwood. This space was originally built as a modern artist's loft with open concept + extra high ceilings and was recently renovated to include new appliances, wood floors and a second bath.

Master suite has a king bed with brand new luxury mattress and private bath with large soaking tub + separate walk-in shower.

Second bedroom is currently furnished as a kids room with bunkbeds that can be converted
neighborhood_overview:
Walk right out into the hiking trails at the end of the street. Close to LA but feels like a million miles away :)

5 min drive to Topanga village with grocery, cafes, vintage shops, post office etc: Inn of the Seventh Ray, Canyon Bistro, Hidden Treasures Vintage Shop, Topanga Living Cafe, Corazon Performing Arts Center.

Winter and Spring are magical with flowers and Mimosa trees in bloom. Watch the moon rise and set through the canyon and the hawks soar above.
host_about: I am a young professional female that loves to travel, experience local cultures and commune with nature.

name_left: Room in Luxury Malibu Penthouse Close to SM
description:
Welcome to my dream home! Enjoy the breathtaking coastline views in my luxurious, bright, 2 br/2 ba penthouse located in Malibu, just a short walk to the beach. Listen to the ocean breezes from the patio overlooking the majestic blue ocean by day and the twinkling city lights by night. Located minutes away from Santa Monica, world class restaurants, shopping, beaches, and more.

Bedroom has bathroom separate from the master bath.

PLEASE NOTE: There are 80 stairs to get to the unit.

The space
Your bedroom has a bathroom that is separate from my bathroom. You will have access to all common spaces, such as the kitchen, the living room, and the outside patio that doubles as a yoga platform overlooking the ocean. You're welcome to to use the in-unit washer and dryer. Enjoy the little garden out front, which you’re welcome to contribute to if that’s your thing!

Guest access
You will have access to all common spaces in additi
neighborhood_overview: The penthouse could not be better located for someone looking to enjoy the beauty and tranquility of Malibu while being minutes away from Santa Monica, the Palisades, and the rest of the Westside. You can walk to a beautiful beach and gorgeous The Getty Villa, and drive to Mastro’s, Gladstone’s, Soho House, Duke’s, Topanga Canyon, hiking trails, and so much more.
host_about: I'm from Los Angeles, love to travel and experience life to the fullest.

name_left: Peaceful and cozy haven with mountain views
description:
Nestled between oaks, cacti and succulents, La Maison Noire is the perfect modern home to unwind and relax. Snuggle up in your bed and wake up to bird songs. Take some time to reconnect with yourself and practice yoga on the expansive wrap around deck. Take in nature while cooking in the fully equipped kitchen. Head out and take the scenic route to renowned beaches or hiking trails.

The space
This haven features:
- 2 bedrooms with Queen bed
- 2 bathrooms with shower
- open living space with fully equipped kitchen
- smart TV with Netflix and Amazon prime
- Designer furnished
- concrete floor
- expansive wrap around deck surrounded by cacti and succulents.

We do ask that you do not wander to other dwellings on the property to respect our neighbors privacy.
Quiet times: 10pm-7am

name_left: Topanga Sanctuary One Minute Walk From State Park
description:
Our home is 1,743 sqft, three bedrooms, and two bathrooms located in the Entrada neighborhood in Topanga. Nestled in the beautiful Santa Monica Mountains on a spacious 1/2 acre lot covered in hundred-year-old Oak trees and your vegetable and herb garden. Your just a stone's throw from the Topanga State Park and, conveniently, ten minutes' drive to the essentials, the Ocean and Sprouts Market.

The space
Your chef's kitchen includes modern appliances, a steam oven, and dual convection ovens. Enjoy the living room with a vaulted ceiling, exposed beams, and floor to ceiling windows looking out into your secret garden. Sleep in style on a Saatva Luxury Mattress in the Master Bedroom, which features a custom hardwood bed, and amply closet space. The master bathroom sports a sunken Japanese bathtub shower. The guest bedroom features a boutique queen bed and. The guest bathroom features a fun ocean adventure shower, designed by Topagna Art Tile. The outdoor entertaini

name_left: Modern Apartment w/ Private Deck & BEAUTIFUL VIEWS
description:
In the heart of Topanga Canyon, our newly renovated apartment sits below our home with its own entrance, washer/dryer, renovated kitchen, carport & private deck with canyon views. The apartment features two cozy nooks: the bedroom features a brand new queen bed with premium bedding, and the lounge has a futon pull-out for relaxing to an album or favorite show. Our little oasis is walkable to breathtaking trails, and a short drive to downtown Topanga, state parks and beaches.

The space
The apartment can sleep a total of four people and was designed to be flexible for vacation or work from home. We designed the space for fluid indoor/outdoor living, with cozy areas to lounge, dine or just enjoy the views. Since we live just upstairs we are available for any questions or needs and hope to create a memorable experience for everyone who stops by our special canyon.

Guest access
The apartment is completely independent with its own entrance and pa
neighborhood_overview: Our home is less than half a mile from several breathtaking Topanga trails. For those looking to venture out, we are a 10 minute drive to downtown Topanga, an adorable pocket of vintage finds and eclectic dining. Within 15-30 minutes you can access the full range of trails and beaches in both Topanga and Malibu. Because we are located at the top of the canyon, we are at the epicenter of LA outdoor adventures.
host_about: I am 29 years old and am currently living in Boston. I am an avid road biker and skiier and love everything outdoors. I am a co-founder of an e-commerce startup, called Brideside.

Situated in one of the most desirable micro climates in Topanga Canyon - Fernwood.

The guest has the entire uninterrupted inside space and private deck. The outside large yard is shared.

All new appliances, microwave, private washer/dryer.

There's a hot tub on the property but this is not for Airbnb use so please do not use it. So sorry!!

Head to the quaint Topanga town and shop for groceries, vintage clothing, acupuncture, exercise, facials and more. Visit the local coffee shops

name_left: Light & Bright Cabin Home at Topanga Canyon Oasis
description:
Bright Topanga home tucked under oak canopy. Private yard boasts plenty of outdoor living & dining space perfect for WFH & social distanced hosting. Master suite enjoys vibrant views of the canyon & garden, large ensuite bathroom & massive shower. Unique sunroom with two workstations plus premium queen sleeper sofa. Second bathroom w/ jacuzzi tub. Bonus satellite studio. Great wifi for WFH. Includes laundry, dishwasher, fireplace, grill. Experience real Topanga living amongst the birds & bees.

The space
Beautiful layout of indoor/outdoor living rarely found in Topanga Canyon. Large renovated cabin with massive master suite and one-of-a-kind sunroom office plus gorgeous bonus satellite yoga/meditation studio gives you plenty of room to work and live and play. Vibrant green front yard connects to large patio lounge complete with bar & grill. Second outdoor living space is tucked into the garden, with a covered pergola and large outdoor dining table. Great for socia
neighborhood_overview:
Located in the Fernwood area of the Canyon, Montau Drive is one of the most grounded neighborhoods that maintains cooler temperatures due to its proximity to the ocean and the sheer volume of plants and trees that shade it, all while still showing off sweeping canyon views.

We will leave personal instructions for some trails that are walkable from the house (one of the reasons we fell in love with the property). Other favorite hikes you can drive to include Tuna Canyon Park, Red Rock Park, and Topanga Canyon Park.

The cabin is a 4 minute drive to our local Mimosa Cafe. We also like Topanga Living Cafe and Cafe 27. Restaurants nearby also include Cholada Thai, the Canyon Bistro, the Inn at the Seventh Ray in Topanga, and the Reel Inn, Malibu Farm Pier Cafe, Nobu, and Gjelina on the PCH. There's even wine tasting at the Rosenthal Winery. All of these are within a 5 to 10 minute drive.

Culturally in Topanga there's Corazon for live music (5 minutes away),
host_about: Fun loving, triple bottom line founder and CEO who wants to make the most of life! I always do Airbnb when travelling for business or with family and friends to get the true local experience. I'm also a host myself for our houses in Hawaii and California!

Surfwood, a private and sun drenched home with ocean views and the best location in Malibu.

The beach is a 5 minute walk, (the home is quiet/without noise from PCH)

Privacy is guaranteed with 10 foot walls and a coded pedestrian gate.

The home has original art, a library, Provence gardens, large pool and beautiful olive trees.

Look for whales with your morning cup, play vintage records by the pool, float and dream, or practice your sun salutations and yoga poses in Surfwood’s gardens🤍

The space
Surfwood is where privacy and anonymity rule.

Surfwood’s monochromatic color scheme will chill you out. You won’t remember the last time you felt so relaxed and restored. The zen vibes start once you enter the gate.

neighborhood_overview:
Sunset Mesa is a fabulous neighborhood and the southern most locale in Malibu, located on a bluff just above the beach and the infamous Getty Villa. The perfect sweet spot, close to the beach without the noise from PCH.

This location gives you everything Malibu has to offer and quick access to the best surf, trails, Topanga Canyon and Pacific Palisades.

The neighborhood is friendly and relaxed. Walking is a favorite pastime in Sunset Mesa, with breathtaking ocean views, two trailheads and many artist’s quirky mid-mod homes and gardens. Sunset Mesa is awesome!

description:
Gated and private, this gorgeous contemporary mediterranean estate, built with a new design, is located just moments from the heart of Beverly Hills. This exquisite home has exceptional quality throughout, great space and scale, high ceilings, and an open floor plan.

The space
The formal two-story entry and elegant rotunda staircase opens to a formal living and dining room. The stunning chefs kitchen is entertainers dream with a huge island and top of the line appliances. There is a state of the art media/family room and gym. Upstairs is an additional media/family room and office. The master bedroom features an elegant sitting area with fireplace. The master bath includes a tub, steam shower, his/her sinks and a vanity area. The fabulous backyard is great for entertaining with a pool, large grassy area, BBQ area, and patio with fireplace.

name_left: Fabulous Beverly Hills Mid-Century
description:
Built in 1952, bright and airy updated mid-century post-and-beam nestled in serene canyon just above downtown Beverly Hills. Walls of glass, open floor plan, designer kitchen, 3 bedroom/2 bath, indoor/outdoor flow, built-in wet bar, fire pit, desert garden. Parks, hiking trails and lake walkable.

The space
Enjoy authentic and classic Eichler-style mid-century post-and-beam architecture with floor-to-ceiling views of the canyon's beautiful natural setting.

Designer kitchen with updated appliances (Bosch dishwasher, GE Cafe gas/convection oven with range and power-boil feature, microwave, toaster oven, two refrigerator/freezers, filtered water with Insta-hot, Nespresso espresso maker with milk frother, French Press.) Fully equipped laundry room with washer/dryer and eco-friendly laundering products.

Open floor plan with spacious living/dining area, floor-to-ceiling windows, views of lush backyard garden and patio, authentic vintage icon
neighborhood_overview: Quiet location with canyon views, only 10 minutes drive from Beverly Hills shops, boutiques and restaurants.  2 parks within walking distance.  One is directly en route to the house, with full playground, stream for children to splash in, beautifully landscaped jogging track, and adjacent orange grove.  The second park is large and more secluded, a hidden gem, only a 5 minute drive or 20 minute walk, the lovely wooded Franklin Canyon Park, with 605 acres of hiking trails, a lake, duck pond, nature center and picnic tables.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

On top of the world in Beverly Hills, enjoy fantastic views with this spacious 3000 square foot 3BR/3.5BA pool home. Minutes to all that LA has to offer, above the Beverly Hills Hotel, yet feel like you're secluded in the country. Not uncommon to wake up and find deer grazing in the yard while you drink your coffee. Furnished with an eclectic mix of designer and antique furniture and all amenities to make your stay enjoyable. The house is isolated and secluded if you wish to quarantine.

The space
This luxurious home has fantastic unobstructed views of the mountains and canyons. With three spacious bedrooms (each with their own en suite bathroom), a den with a sofa bed and a large sectional couch in the living room, the home can accommodate large groups easily. Being in the hills, wildlife abounds and you can often forget that you're in the heart of the City.   All with a fantastic view and a great pool and backyard to enjoy.

Although modern, very warm & comfortable. People that come over never want to leave.

The space

The Getty Museum is a stones throw away. But, you may never leave since everything you need is right here. 405 and 101 Hwy close so Venice, Santa Monica, Los Feliz, Silver Lake are easy drives.

Guest access
The media room is designed so you can wat
host_about: I'm an open minded world traveler.  I direct feature films in Hollywood, but often shoot on location around the world.  I love to cook.  I love eating at innovative restaurants.  Music is an important part of who I am.  I DJ electronic music when I'm not busy making movies.  Airbnb suits me because I find it a better way to realize the experience of a city I'm in instead of the bubble of a hotel.  If I go the Hotel route, I like modern chic as opposed to traditional.  I live by the motto "You only fail if you stop trying"  I'm a great host because I understand what's important when traveling.  I always have my house stocked with the necessities you don't want to have to go looking for when you're in a new house in a new city.  I'm a great guest, because I respect how important ones living place is to them.  It helps to be on both sides of the Airbnb coin to fully understand that.

neighborhood_overview:
Your apartment is located a few houses away from our landmark Doheny (Greystone) Mansion - a hidden jewel owned by city of Beverly Hills, celebrity dinners, chamber concerts and plays as well as festivals are held there. One can enjoy beautiful, well catered to, gardens any day (with the exception of some big holidays) from 10AM to 5PM. Just like our house it is located just north of Sunset blvd, which makes a combination of being situated on a private, quiet street, while being very central.
The mansion itself is a 55-room, Tudor-style former residence, 46,000 sq ft (4,300 m2), it is situated on 16 acres (6.5 ha) of land. At the time it was built, it cost over $4 million and was the most expensive home built in California up to that time.
Greystone is now a public park, and is also used as a location for special events, including the Beverly Hills Flower & Garden Festival. The estate is popular as a filming location due to its beauty, manicured grounds and Beverly Hills loc
host_about: For work I design elaborate and crafty vintage style dresses with bohemian flare, which translates to my choice of space and furniture. I enjoy entraining guests passionately, so hosting through airbnb is a great joy for me.

name_left: 20's Spanish in exclusive BH's neighborhood
description:
Charming '20's Spanish in one of the most desirable and exclusive areas of Beverly Hills; tastefully furnished down to linen sheets, comforters and pillows, stocked bar, antiques...large white down sofas, seisal carpets, hardwood floors... Very large lushly planted garden eclectically furnished with Balinese furniture. Walk out your door and take a lovely hike up the hill through the Crest streets or walk down to infamous Greystone mansion, Sunset Strip or Beverly Hills Hotel

The space
This house is located in one of the most exclusive, desirable locations in L.A. As it is one of the older areas it's very lush...lots of big old oak trees, palms, olive trees... My backyard is basically a forest...I have an huge avocado tree, walnut trees, fruit trees, and an abundance of bouganvillea... I feel as if I'm truly in Italy. neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is an historic neighborhood, part of the old Doheny estate, and over time has become very green and lush. The neighborhood is comprised of LA's three largest mansions as well as several celebrities. Among them, Paul Allen , Bette Midler,  formerly Kenny Rogers, Christina Aguilera and Tyra Banks. It is particularly unique in that it is surrounded by nature, yet close to the city. So you wake up and go to bed with the sound of birds. But within 1 minute you are in the middle of everything. Six or seven minutes to Beverly Hills Shopping, lunching on Sunset Plaza, meeting for cocktails at the Beverly Hills Hotel or dinner at Chateau Marmont.  West Hollywood is to the East and Beverly Hills to the West, both brimming with activity and opportunity. Melrose Avenue is a diverse neighborhood that offers a glimpse into L.A.'s fashion and underground culture. host_about:
Living The Dream offers a 5* luxury hospitality services, with selection of business services and concierge services (exotic rental cars, private jets, yachts, dining reservations, and entertainment).

Living the dream offers the epitome of a luxury vacation to travelers seeking the glitz and glamor associated with this world-famous California destination. From private Los Angeles villas overlooking a tremendous Hollywood Hills to high-end shopping excursions on Rodeo Drive and mouth-watering five-star restaurants in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles is a mecca for all things luxury.

Condensing Los Angeles into a stereotype associated with celebrity lifestyles and Hollywood luxury would never do this California city justice. This beautiful city boasts a wide range of daytime activities and nightlife adventures making it a top vacation choice. Some vacationers travel to LA for the allure of cinema-worthy scenes and iconic entertainment centers, while others come to explore the diverse Pacific Coast beach towns or to unearth the natural beauty presented by its lulling valleys and majestic mountain ranges. Rent a Lo Angeles villa in one of the city's most popular neighborhoods to get the most out of your trip.

You have your own private entry, huge balcony, spacious bedroom, and bath with no shared space with the Host. Come and go as you please. Micro wave, refrigerator and coffee maker are provided.

name_left: Art Nouveau house
description:
A very special Sun-drenched canyon home, locally famous for its sculpted Art Nouveau style. It stands alone on a private street in Beverly Glen Canyon. It has garage parking with interior entrance as well as outside parking. Four people would be very comfortable and would enjoy absolute privacy and quietude. Contains all the amenities needed for an enjoyable stay. The host lives nearby and will help with whatever is possible. The minimum stay is one week.

The space
The house is surprisingly close to everything worth going to, including LAX.
Everyone has a great time and feels it is a good value. Please read the reviews!
neighborhood_overview:
Totally private. Its like being away from it all, but minutes to Beverly Hills or the Valley, with the exception of rush hour. The Beach and Venice, as well as downtown also are not very distant, but L.A. is now rated number one for traffic! LAX is only 20 minutes in the early AM >
there are 5 restaurants, including a breakfast Deli in the Glen Shopping Center, which is only one mile away. Also, there is a local market which could be walked to. The house has everything, but is not set up for cooking large meals. There is walking available on the street but it is steep. Plenty of sun on the deck and extremely quiet at night.
host_about: I am an architect and home builder. I built this house and the only other two houses near this one. I maintain these houses and the 15 acres of open land surrounding them, myself. These houses are built in the Art Nouveau style as I had an Art Nouveau Gallery in Beverly Hills for 15 years and wished to build in this style to compliment by Gallery. I am an avid art collector and considered an expert in my field.. I live to just manage this property and to improve it every day. I look forward to making friends with my guests.      .

name_left: Self-Isolate with Majestic Views/BEVERLY  HILLS 4B
description:
Self-Isolate with Majestic Views / BEVERLY HILLS / Architectural Design Award
6 Guests / 4 En-suite Bedrooms / 5.5 Baths

The space
This State is possibly Zoltan Pali's most thought-provoking achievement in modernist architecture. This fully automated home has been meticulously designed and executed from its steel construction to the relationships between structure and elements, home and statement. The exteriors futuristic yet timeless "fin" design controls light and shade creating a prism effect. On the main level, the living room, dining room and kitchen seamlessly connect to defy gravity, floating above spectacular views of Los Angeles and beyond. description:
A large room in Beverly Hills mini-mansion. Celebrity hood with manicured streets by Rodeo Drive, Sunset Strip, West Hollywood (WEHO), UCLA. LACMA, Getty, Hammer, Beverly Hills Hotel. Perfect for a solo traveler, or a couple.

The space
As you enter through a spectacular heavy antique front door, you are presented with an Andalusianesque brick tile hallway with arched doors and skylights, and your room is first on the right. Arched oak door opens to your space. The room has a sitting area, queen slay bed and extensive storage shelving. Guest access
your room, common bathroom.

I have an indoor/outdoor cat
Heating/AC is central
Bathroom is shared.
We do notify other tenants and guests to be quiet between hours of 10PM and 7AM, but dwelling noise is expected.

License number
neighborhood_overview: The house itself is located on a lovely, surrounded by celebrity homes (Tom Cruise, Kirk Douglas a family of Frank Sinatra) residential street by Greystone Mansion (also knows as Doheny Estate), a hidden jewel community park (public visiting hours are 10AM-5PM), central to LA's most loved shopping, dining, beaches, and museums, it remains exclusive and serene. Just because the streets are so manicured and lovely, I do enjoy taking "European style" extensive walks with the purpose to the neighboring contemporary bars and restaurants, book stores and coffee houses near Sunset Plaza or to have a jazz/drink evening at Polo Lounge at Beverly Hills Hotel. Short Uber drive back is usually under $5 (beats valet parking or potential $60 parking ticket, if you walk off Sunset Plaza while parked at their parking lot or miss your meter expiration time by a minute), also it makes me feel like I am doing good for my body.
host_about: For work I design elaborate and crafty vintage style dresses with bohemian flare, which translates to my choice of space and furniture. I enjoy entraining guests passionately, so hosting through airbnb is a great joy for me.

neighborhood_overview:
Beverly Hills is an affluent city in Los Angeles. It is world-famous for its luxurious culture and famous residents. The city is home to renowned shopping district, Rodeo Drive and West Hollywood area.

Beverly Hills has a Unified School District, which includes four K-8 schools (Hawthorne, El Rodeo, Beverly Vista, and Horace Mann), Moreno High School, and the Beverly Hills High School. The schools rank high in the state and the nation.

Roxbury Park is still a beautiful park with a very classy crowd. The park is safe and people play volleyball, walk their dogs, climb on the play structure, have picnics and BBQs.

I am a jet pilot and I have traveled all over the world.

Rick

name_left: THE ULTIMATE GRAND BEVERLY HILLS SUPERSTAR MANSION
description:
The ultimate Beverly Hills estate with a historic villa on one of the area’s most prestigious streets. Designed in the 1920s by registered architect Arthur Zwebell for Hollywood legend Loretta Young, this house is a rare gem. Original iconic California Spanish details - living room’s beamed cathedral ceilings and 2 story fireplace surround, freeform lagoon pool with a cascading jacuzzi and brick coping and two huge masters. Skillfully updated to the latest in style and cutting edge-technology.

The space
The house was meant to be relished with luxury and abandon by those with discriminating tastes. Once you pass the heavy iron gates and walk inside you will know right away why this house is a grade above others. The estate will be yours to enjoy as you please, with good sense and respect of course. It is after all a gem reserved for the special few. It has through the years hosted such top Hollywood luminaries as Loretta Young, Vivien Leigh, Lawrence Olivier and C
neighborhood_overview: The best neighborhood in Los Angeles that is not only most renowned for its prestige and beauty, but also most conveniently and safely located. Moments from Rodeo Drive’s upscale splendor, right next door to West Hollywood’s bustling night life and a short drive down Sunset Boulevard to the ocean or the other way right into the excitement of the downtown. This is the heart of Beverly Hills proper, residential 90210, Beverly Hills school district and most importantly our police and fire department. Instantaneous response and attention to every detail no matter what the need any time of the day and night. Whether you’re walking to the Beverly Hills Hotel for a coffee, biking to the Will Rodgers Park, the Hermes boutique or hiking at the Coldwater Nature Reserve, you will be well taken care of.
host_about: Singer-songwriter, producer, mom, wife, avid traveler, organic eater, independent mind and an old soul. music obsessive and lover of all beautiful things. I am a super picky person and a discriminating traveler, so I understand how important comfort and luxury are to a guest and I promise to take great care of you. Favorite hotels: Claridges in London, Plaza Athenee in Paris, Le Pre de la Mer in St. Tropez, Ritz Carlton in NY, Bristol in Warsaw and The Biltmore in Santa Barbara.

The property has amazing views of Los Angeles skyline, with plenty of seating to relax and take in the views.

Guest access
Guests have access to the entire property, including garage, pool and pathway down to th
neighborhood_overview: This home is set atop a promontory offering stunning views of Greater Los Angeles. Anchored by Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills is home to some of the world’s finest haute couture, as well as a spectrum of renowned fine dining restaurants.
host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

name_left: Hutton by Open Air Homes
description:
Step inside this calming 4 bedroom home, tucked in to a private street in Beverly Hills. Once inside you will find this charming designer home has everything you could need to fully enjoy your vacation in Los Angeles. From the outdoor showers, to the lush landscaping, this home is suited for the traveler who wants to enjoy all that LA has to offer, and come home to a tranquil, warm and comfortable environment. You will fall in love with this home and this area, and never want to leave.

The space
Committed to Your Safety: Open Air Homes takes sanitization seriously. We are following all CDC Cleaning and Disinfecting Guidelines to assure you have a safe stay during this time. We are fortunate to have some of the best cleaners in the business, with many of them going on their 8th year of employment at Open Air Homes. We are genuinely grateful for their service, and have always paid our cleaning team a fair and liveable wage. Our cleaners always wear masks and
neighborhood_overview:
The rolling hills of Beverly Hills are the perfect enclave to come home to after a day of exploring LA. This private, gated house tucked into the hillside is perfect for the discerning guest who wants ultimate privacy, yet close access to incredible restaurants, shopping and sights.

We aim to always be good members of this community, and do not tolerate the party groups or late night loud music. The future of successful rentals in Los Angeles will be established on the respect renters show to the homes they rent, and we have an absolute no party policy in this home. We ask that you respect the neighbors and the volume of noise late at night, and in turn we will provide you with a relaxing vacation and incredible memories.
host_about:
Welcome to Open Air Homes!  We have been hosting short term rentals for the past 7 years and have always been obsessed with the customer experience.  Your experience.   Open Air Homes is design driven, hospitality focused and always looking to create comfortable experiences for you and your families.   We believe that a high end rental experience starts with the amenities of a hotel along with the conveniences of a home. 

-The Open Air ECOSYSTEM OF COMPANIES-

At Open Air, we continue to reimagine the future of home ownership with our homeowner partners.  A significant number of our former guests have purchased homes and have asked us to help manage and monetize their property while they travel.  We handle every aspect of the property maintenance and management, while ensuring a top of class hospitality experience for all guests in the home. 

-Open Air Design by Interior Particulier-

We have an average of 4.9 stars across our portfolio of homes due to our steadfast commitment to design.  Open Air Design by Interior Particulier believes that great design can happen at a wide variety of price points, and we are here to help our homeowner partners with all of their design needs to set their home up for success in a crowded rental market. 

-Open Air Developments-

At Open Air Developments, we are currently in development of four exciting projects in Los Angeles.  Our flip projects range from small home flips to large scale redevelopments with well established architects. 

-OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman-

OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman, a licensed brokerage, is here to help you find your dream home.  Whether you're looking for an investment property, vacation home, or a long term rental property, our team of agents can help.  CA DRE License (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name_left: Beverly Hills French Villa
description:
Rare opportunity to lease one of the most majestic, palatial villas in the heart of Beverly Hills. Behind private gates on one of the most coveted streets in Beverly Hills, this property is available fully furnished, in-furnished or semi-furnished. Enter via the grand entrance showcasing double marble stairways and a magnificent 30ft dome. Finest materials, exquisite furnishing and its location, makes this estate simply a one of a kind offering for a prestigious & private tenant.

The space
12 bedrooms, 13 bathrooms, underground parking for 14 cars, Marble stairways, beautiful pool with gazebos, spacious bar, and built-in 60 sqft granite BBQ countertop, 2 private gates, balconies, 2 dining rooms, 2 kitchens, elevator.

Other things to note
Wifi password will be given upon check-in.
neighborhood_overview: Located in one of the most iconic cities in California, Beverly Hills! Extremely private and located minutes from the infamous Rodeo Drive, Beverly Hills Hotel, Museums, The Los Angeles Country Club, and more. Exquisitely designed & built with impeccable taste, this sophisticated & stylish french villa sits behind 2 private gates. This multi-level villa is complete with a 5,000 sqft lower level used for gym, games/billiard room, TV room, sauna, as well as Chauffer's bedroom and bathroom and also has underground parking available for 14 cars.
host_about:
Farideh Bogari, founder of Bogari Agency, Acquisition, Development & Management located in Beverly Hills, CA, specializes in fine estates, residential, commercial and development properties. Farideh has extensive multicultural and international experience and is fluent in English, Persian, German and Turkish which has enabled her to work with clients from all over the world including A-list celebrities like the legend, Stan Lee, Britney Spears, Jean Claude Van Damme and Royal families, who have managed to score dream Hollywood Hills homes.  One particular Beverly Hills sale landed Farideh on national television Bravo’s Million Dollar Listing show.

Farideh has a solid reputation with clients as being the best negotiator. Her clients know that real estate is available on the internet for the public BUT not everyone can successfully negotiate the best deal.

What distinguishes Farideh from other real estate companies is her full real estate service that offers full concierge and a construction development group to build small and large properties from scratch and delivered turn key, as well as worldwide hotel and resort management and advisory services.

host_about:
Living The Dream offers a 5* luxury hospitality services, with selection of business services and concierge services (exotic rental cars, private jets, yachts, dining reservations, and entertainment).

Living the dream offers the epitome of a luxury vacation to travelers seeking the glitz and glamor associated with this world-famous California destination. From private Los Angeles villas overlooking a tremendous Hollywood Hills to high-end shopping excursions on Rodeo Drive and mouth-watering five-star restaurants in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles is a mecca for all things luxury.

Condensing Los Angeles into a stereotype associated with celebrity lifestyles and Hollywood luxury would never do this California city justice. This beautiful city boasts a wide range of daytime activities and nightlife adventures making it a top vacation choice. Some vacationers travel to LA for the allure of cinema-worthy scenes and iconic entertainment centers, while others come to explore the diverse Pacific Coast beach towns or to unearth the natural beauty presented by its lulling valleys and majestic mountain ranges. Rent a Lo Angeles villa in one of the city's most popular neighborhoods to get the most out of your trip.

host_about:
Hi, my name is Stuart and I'm a born and raised New Yorker living in Los Angeles with my family. Serial entrepreneur and owner of LA's most trusted and popular short-term rental company, Stay Awhile Villas.    I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

I have traveled the world and love passing along my best travel experiences to our guests by making you feel like a member of an expensive travel club.   We have a beautiful collection of luxury residences including some of our own in the most popular neighborhoods in Los Angeles, Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, Bel Air, Hollywood Hills, and of course Malibu.  We are extremely accomplished hosts on Airbnb with the following accolades:

   -  9 x Airbnb Superhost, 10 Airbnb Plus Listings.
   -  10 LUX Listings
    - 779+ 5-Star reviews

Our properties have been featured in Travel + Leisure, Angeleno, People Magazine, FOX, NBC, Wall Street Journal, Daily Mail, TMZ, History Channel, Mansion Global, Los Angeles Times, New York Times, and more.  Our guests include some of the most famous film and music personalities, C level executives of Fortune 500 companies, and Royal Families. 

Whether you are coming here for vacation, business, or pleasure we are here to make your stay as simple and luxurious as possible.  We offer the following services to our guests via our concierge partner(*additional fees may apply):

    - Personal Chefs and Catering
    - Luxury Dining Recommendations and Reservations
    - Vacation Planning and Excursion Recommendations 
    - Villa Pre-Stocking (Groceries and Personal Item Requests) 
    - Luxury Vehicle Rentals 
    - Chauffeur Services
    - Yacht/Jet Charters 
   

See all our Airbnb portfolio of listings here: www.airbnb.com/p/los-angeles-vacation-rentals   I would also recommend you read our incredible reviews - https://www.airbnb.com/users/reviews/ (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) Thank you for taking the time to read a little about us and we look forward to working with you. 

Stuart Heller and the Stay Awhile Team

name_left: LUXURY HOME IN LOVELY BRENTWOOD (Santa Monica)
description:
Luxury bright apartment in the heart of charming Brentwood - walking distance to all the cool shops and local stores, and only minutes from the BEACH, downtown Santa Monica, Venice, Westwood and Beverly Hills.

The space
Located in the heart of beautiful and trendy Brentwood. Spacious beautifully furnished 1 bedroom with all the comforts of home. Come and feel all the comforts of home and more. Your comfy robe and slippers await for each guest. Hardwood floors, carpeted bedroom, queen bed with luxury bedding, fully equipped kitchen. Free personal parking space in the back of building. High speed Wifi and TV services including HBO/Showtime/Netflix/Amazon Prime as well as Apple TV in bedroom. Luxury bedding and towels. TV in living room and TV in bedroom. Air conditioning in living room and bedroom. Super quiet street and yet just four blocks from WholeFoods, Starbucks as well as all the cool shops and restaurants.(Rag and Bone, Ron Herman, Katsuya, Vincente
neighborhood_overview: My location is extremely safe, one of the few "walking neighborhoods" in LA.   A car is not necessary for most places, you can walk, bike or take the bus everywhere. .Santa Monica Beach is 3.2 miles away, about 10-15 by bus. Hollywood is about 9 miles away, about 20 minutes by bus. Hiking in the mountains close by as well as the beach of course!
host_about: I'm a London girl.  Been living in L.A. for 20 years and travel a lot for business and pleasure.  I have a whole bunch of fun friends in the area who I hike and bike and with.  I absolutely love driving up PCH to Santa Barbara for the day or a long weekend.  New York is probably my second favorite place to visit in the States, and always a stop for me on the way to London.  I'm in the entertainment business and am a committed health-nut.  Cafe Gratitude is a weekly "must" along with a movie at The Landmark. Love meeting new people from all over, so I look forward to meeting you soon!

The space
LOCATION
If “location, location, location” is a top priority for you when choosing a place to stay, then this guesthouse is the perfect choice! It’s close to all the hot spots in West Los Angeles and Santa Monica, as well as within easy reach of the major freeways if you want to explore other areas of the city. The guesthouse, which is nestled in a hideaway on one of the neighborhood’s most beautiful, tree-lined streets, is also located only a short walk to a favorite Brentwood hang-out, the Brentwood Country Mart (see more details below).

A uniquely crafted loft gives this bright, spacious and cheerful guesthouse its homey character while also providing space for a
neighborhood_overview: Located in between the Brentwood Country Mart and the Brentwood Country Club, on a beautiful, quiet, tree-lined street.
host_about:
I was born in Los Angeles and have lived here all my life except for my college and graduate school years. After completing my Masters in Public Health, I moved back to Los Angeles where my career path included a variety of medical research work as well as different grassroots organizing jobs. 

I have always been an ardent dog lover, and after leaving my last job at a humanitarian aid organization, I became involved in therapy dog volunteer work with several of my dogs. 

I currently live in the house I grew up in, which I share with two incredibly sweet Chocolate Labrador dogs who I adore and who provide me with constant love, affection and entertainment. I am in the process of training them to be therapy dogs because they have the ideal temperament for meeting people of all types and ages.

host_about:
I grew up in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan. I graduated from Indiana University in 1987 with a degree in Marketing. We have owned our home for that past 20 years in Brentwood. I work in legal technology sales and I work a lot from my home. I received my MBA from Loyola University and my spouse works at UCLA with a Ph.D in Education. We have hosted cousins from France to Australia in the unit and enjoy meeting new people. My spouse is fluent in French. We enjoy cookouts on our deck and newcomers are welcome. We also respect your privacy as well.

Our family loves to travel and last year we stayed with cousins in Australia and Paris and went on a two week musical choral tour of mainland China. 

We are open to suggestions to make your stay the best possible experience in Los Angeles. If the unit is missing something, please let us know. 

We live just 2 blocks south of the Brentwood Country Club which has an excellent  running area with a 3 mile dirt/grass path around the perimeter of the golf course. On Sundays you can also walk to the AMAZING organic and fresh Farmers Market next to the golf course.

name_left: Modern Guest Unit in Brentwood Area of LA
description:
Available for month-to-month only. Recently remodeled, our modern guest unit/granny flat is in a quiet, residential Brentwood neighborhood of Los Angeles. The unit is located above our private garage and has its own separate entrance. It is a 1,000 sq foot studio space, high ceilings, bright and airy and sleek. Updated kitchen and bathroom and spacious common area. 1 queen size bed and 1 bathroom. Garage and driveway are not available for use. Plenty of free street parking only.

The space
Unit Includes:
-Brand new refrigerator
-Brand new dish washer
-Utensils, plates, cups, basic cookware (a few pots and pans)
- Basic cooking supplies (cooking oil, salt, pepper, etc.)
-Nespresso Coffee Machine with complimentary coffee
- Complimentary Tea
-General Cleaning Supplies
- Linens, towels, bedding
-Blow Dryer
-Fire Extinguisher
-Television with Smart TV system
- Unit is linked to Amazon Echo System. Ask Alexa
neighborhood_overview:
Brentwood is a beautiful residential area nestled between Beverly Hills, Pacific Palisades, and Santa Monica. We are walking distance to some of the city's best shops and restaurants on San Vicente Blvd. and Montana Avenue. Easy bike ride or walk to Santa Monica beach and Brentwood Country Mart.

Great jogging loop around the Brentwood Country Club, only 2 min walk from house.

20 min drive to Beverly Hills (no traffic)
25 min drive to Venice Beach (no traffic)
25 min to West Hollywood (no traffic)
45 min to Downtown Los Angeles (no traffic)

description:
You'll love your stay in our 1 bedroom apartment in Brentwood. Centrally located- a short drive to UCLA, Santa Monica/Venice, and Beverly Hills, and near the highways to get you to Hollywood and Downtown.

The space
Located in a residential complex, this recently remodeled apartment opens up to the open living room/dining area. The spacious living room has a pull-out couch that sleeps 2. The kitchen just off of the living room will be stocked with the essentials (pots, pans, plates, cups, utensils) needed to cook a meal during your stay. The bathroom has a shower/tub combo and the bedroom has a queen sized bed.

Guest access
Guests have access to the 1 bedroom,parking for 1 car, and the shared outdoor patio

Other things to note
1 bath towel per person is provided. Beach towels are not provided. There are laundry machines on site. Parking for 1 car.

No Parties. No Smoking. No Pets.
neighborhood_overview: Brentwood is a good "hub" to LA attractions- just a short drive to the main sights (4 miles to Santa Monica Pier and Promenade to the west and to Beverly Hills in the east) , walking distance to the shops and restaurants on Wilshire Blvd, minutes to the UCLA campus, and near Sawtelle Japantown. There are two Whole Foods a short drive away (Wilshire or San Vicente) and a Ralph's supermarket down the street.

host_about: Hello...I'm Tobin, thanks for stopping by!  I'm a self-employed personal trainer, real estate agent and property manager, and have been living in LA for 22 years.  Originally from the midwest, I moved just after graduating college.  I'm happy to have made LA home.  I believe it is one of the best places to live, there is so much to do; restaurants, theater, concerts, the beach, hiking, people watching, shopping, travel, weekend trips, mountains, whatever you like!  If you need any suggestions with restaurants, things to do, or getting around L.A. I'm happy to help.   I am an easy-going, low-key host that enjoys meeting new people and I'm looking forward to your visit!

name_left: Cozy Writer's Retreat in Brentwood
description:
The space
This is my home. It will not be available often on airbnb. Only when I’m traveling. It’s a charming, well-appointed, airy one bedroom apartment in a classic Los Angeles style, with outdoor patio and lots for fresh air. Wood floors, a good little kitchen, with all the cookware, dish ware and utensils you could possibly need. A comfy real bed. And a pull-out sofa-bed if you need more sleeping space. Apple TV with access to Netflix, Amazon, HBO, etc. And books (if you’re an old soul). Lots of books.

The neighborhood (Brentwood) is next door to Santa Monica, about 2.5 miles from the ocean. It’s a clean, safe place to live, walking distance to Whole Foods Market, and lots of restaurants. There’s an open-air farmers market every Sunday morning. And easy access to major avenues and highways.

This is not some frequent-flyer airbnb rental that nobody lives in. If you like to stay in a home with charm, feel like it’s YOUR home (only without the host) t

host_about:
My name is Elliot, and I manages a professional furnished housing company called, Bedford Corporate Housing. Either myself personally or, my associate,  Maricel, will be delighted to assist you throughout your stay.

A professional team  awaits to  assist you with your check-in and stay while in LA. I live relatively close to my inventory of properties and am always available including evenings and weekends if you need assistance.

Being an established organization means each apartment is professionally cleaned and sanitized prior, including a follow up by a detailed inspection of the apartment prior to your move-in to double check it is in tip-top condition.  

Please not that the majority of my reservations are not through airbnb.  Therefore, many of my listings do not have reviews.  However, if you need more reassurance, please view overall reviews or on (Hidden by Airbnb) .  

As a word of caution, there  many  other listings in the area are not real people and run by "bots" and  "avatars"  which if you read the other reviews can be a problem when you are trying to check-in or have an issue with the apartment. 

I can assure you that is not the case with use so you can enjoy your stay with peace of mind.  Hope to see you soon,

Elliot

name_left: Delightful 2BR Condominium in Los Angeles
description:
This home is a short drive to the University of California Los Angeles and The Getty, a vast collection of artworks and rotating exhibitions, as well as an architectural gem. You are within walking distance of Whole Foods Market, Starbucks, Orangetheory Fitness, and many eateries on San Vicente Blvd. Wilshire Blvd is just a few blocks further and offers many more options for shopping, dining, and nightlife. 

Enjoy a stay with Zeus! We have 3730+ reviews (see below).

The space
At Zeus, we offer thoughtfully furnished homes for 30+ day stays.

Our homes come equipped with handpicked essentials, from premium mattresses and linens to kitchen basics like pots and pans, chef’s knives, and wine glasses. Your home is also equipped with high-speed WiFi and cleaning supplies like dish soap, paper towels, a vacuum, and laundry detergent so you’ll have everything you need from the moment you arrive. Your Zeus home is warm, comfortable, and ready for li
host_about:
We built Zeus Living so you can feel at home wherever opportunity takes you. Whether it’s for a month, a year, or sometime in between, you can count on a thoughtfully designed home and a comfortable, easy stay. Our technology helps us select homes you’ll love in ideal locations at a good value, while our expert team handles all the details. Based in San Francisco, and operating in the Bay Area, Los Angeles, New York City, Seattle, Boston, and Washington, D.C.


** 
PLEASE NOTE: Many of our homes are pet friendly, which you will see listed under "House Rules". If you do plan to bring your furry friend(s), we have a one-time non-refundable $500 pet fee and have a limit of 2 pets max. We have several dog breed restrictions. Most of our dog-friendly homes do not allow American Pit bulls, Rottweilers, Akitas, Cane Corsos, Presa Canarios, Bull Mastiffs, Staffordshire Terriers, Dobermans, German Shepherds, Boxers, Malamutes, Huskies, Dalmatians, Chow Chows, Fila Brasileiros, or Wolf hybrids. We encourage individuals with service animals or one of the breeds listed as restricted to contact us before booking.

Walking distance to Whole Foods, restaurants, like The Brentwood, Lemonade, Maria'a Italian Kitchen, Starbucks, to name a few. This is a great location, on Barrington between Sunset and San Vicente. Situated 2.2 miles from UCLA, close to the 405 Freeway, 11 miles to LAX, and 5 miles to the Beach and the Santa Monica Pier. Close to the Getty. On Sundays, farmers market at Brentwood Science School. They have everything, fresh fruits, bakery, flowers, jewelry, tacos...walking distance!

The space
The bedroom is a large about 20 x 14. The bathroom is also large. There is a tv with many channels. There is a king size bed. Mid century modern furniture.
What I like is that there is a window in the bathroom for fresh air.

Guest access
The kitchen is available if needed. There is a washer and dryer, just ask to use it please.
There is a large bright balcony off the living room.

Other things to note
I will give
neighborhood_overview: This neighborhood is one of the best in Los Angeles.  It is located below the hills that are call the Brentwood Hills and west of Bel Air and UCLA.   We are below Sunset Blvd and above Montana Ave.  What is nice is you can easily walk to Whole Foods, Starbucks, Coffee Bean, and many nice restaurants.  I recently tried sweetgreen for a salad and liked it.  Maria's Italian Kitchen is up the street also in the Brentwood Village.  You will find a couple of bakeries also, like Bellwood and another across from Maria's.

name_left: Prime Brentwood Studio w/ Gym, Pool near UCLA, San Vicente by Blueground
description:
Show up and start living from day one in Los Angeles with this spacious studio Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Brentwood home. (#LAX60)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your beautiful living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Brentwood apartment has to offer.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this studio apartment include an on-site:

- In-Building Laundry
- Pet Friendly
- Swimming Pool
- Gym
- Indoor Parking
- Garden

- Elevator

Oth
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. In addition, the historic Brentwood Country Mart is a beloved family-friendly retail hub that first opened in 1948. The Getty Center museum is also located in Brentwood and offers a world-class art collection that is ideal for culture lovers.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Why take a chance picking & choosing between so many individual hosts when you can enjoy the highest-quality guest experience from one consistent host -- Blueground. We are a global real estate tech company offering +3500 fully-equipped & furnished apartments for a month, a year or longer across 12 cities and 3 continents. Centrally-based in vibrant neighborhoods, each home is tech-powered & furnished by our expert Interior Design teams. Enjoy at-home amenities like high-speed WiFi, a fully-stocked kitchen, smart TV, premium bedding/towels, quality toiletries, and depending on the apartment choice -- artisan coffee, bluetooth speakers & select building amenities such as pools, gyms & outdoor spaces. From meal, wine & grocery delivery to laundry & dry-cleaning right to your door, our guests can choose from a number of service benefits. Each apartment is safe & professionally sanitized.

During your stay
Driven by a mission to help you show up & start living, Blueground is proud to host thousands of guests around the world in the following cities: New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Chicago, Washington D.C., Seattle, Dubai, Istanbul, Paris, London and Athens.
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours to enjoy; and for additional support, our Client Experience team is available via phone, email & our Guest App through which you can schedule additional cleanings, request fresh towels/linens, submit maintenance requests, and view neighborhood recommendations. We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name_left: Increadible Villa with pool indoor outdoor living
description:
book your stay at this Villa in Paradise! huge backyard, swimming pool, outdoor and indoor jacuzzi, waterfall, full modern outdoor casita, 2 full kitchens, outdoor TV, large BBQ, guest room, 3guest bathroom, spectacular remodeled 4 bedroom home in/outdoor living,fireplaces, HDTV in all rooms 15K sqft grounds and a upper casita.
A unique vacation spot you have never seen before.

( PLEASE SEE OUR VIDEO:
WWW. luxuryrentalslosangeles.net)
separate rental contract needs to be signed before booking!

The space
The perfect place to have a dinner party at 1 of our 3 large dining tables, relax and enjoy the views, or a family swim in our large pool and luxury lounge beds. Throw a Bbq and enjoy our build in appliances with this large outdoor kitchen, that includes a dishwasher, stove, bbq and brittle, while you can watch sports or new on the upper HDTV. Play a round of table tennis and jump into the Jacuzzi. Have a romantic dinner and turn on one
neighborhood_overview:
This home is located below the Santa Monica mountains for great hikes, close to the glam of Beverly hills and conveniently located to the beaches.
The best feature is the low key yet stylish restaurants and shops in walking distance weather you want to go to the Sunday farmers market on the corner, or to Brentwood Gardens with a variety of gyms, soul Cycle, shops, hairdressers etc, or walk down to the famous Brentwood country mart with its quaint shops and restaurants. There is lots to do and you can actually walk!
host_about:
We are a family from Europe residing in America and working in a family business in Lo Angeles.
We own a vacation home in Palm Springs on the same street as our rental home. We fell in love with this neighborhood during a visit at a friend home and decided we needed a retreat there to relax from the stresses of everyday life. To us Palm springs is heaven, full of nature, calmness, fun and outdoor activities. We enjoy playing golf, going out for nice dinners and having cocktails in our jacuzzi with friends and family. We are very honest,hard working, kind people, who want there guests to have the best time during there stay here.
We make an effort to be always reachable in order to  to assist with any needs or questions a guest might have. We are very hands on!
Always happy to accommodate all kinds of special requests. We do appreciate our home be treated with love and respect in return. Its all about having a good time, as life needs to be enjoyed every single day! :)

name_left: Bristol Circle
host_about:
Welcome to Open Air Homes!  We have been hosting short term rentals for the past 7 years and have always been obsessed with the customer experience.  Your experience.   Open Air Homes is design driven, hospitality focused and always looking to create comfortable experiences for you and your families.   We believe that a high end rental experience starts with the amenities of a hotel along with the conveniences of a home. 

-The Open Air ECOSYSTEM OF COMPANIES-

At Open Air, we continue to reimagine the future of home ownership with our homeowner partners.  A significant number of our former guests have purchased homes and have asked us to help manage and monetize their property while they travel.  We handle every aspect of the property maintenance and management, while ensuring a top of class hospitality experience for all guests in the home. 

-Open Air Design by Interior Particulier-

We have an average of 4.9 stars across our portfolio of homes due to our steadfast commitment to design.  Open Air Design by Interior Particulier believes that great design can happen at a wide variety of price points, and we are here to help our homeowner partners with all of their design needs to set their home up for success in a crowded rental market. 

-Open Air Developments-

At Open Air Developments, we are currently in development of four exciting projects in Los Angeles.  Our flip projects range from small home flips to large scale redevelopments with well established architects. 

-OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman-

OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman, a licensed brokerage, is here to help you find your dream home.  Whether you're looking for an investment property, vacation home, or a long term rental property, our team of agents can help.  CA DRE License (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

neighborhood_overview:
Perched on LA’s Westside, at the base of the Santa Monica Mountains, Brentwood is an upscale neighborhood teeming with high-end boutiques, fine dining, and luxurious gardens. The main thoroughfare in the community is San Vicente Boulevard, where eateries, cafes, and the historic Brentwood County Mart sit along tree-lined avenues.

Brentwood is also home to the famous Getty Center, which boasts extensive museums, scenic gardens, and stunning views that draw millions of visitors every year. Sprawling estates and luxury apartments comprise the bulk of the rental market in Brentwood, providing many options for a lavish lifestyle in the hills.

name_left: Bright Brentwood 2BR w/ Outdoor Pool, walk to shops, by Blueground
description:
Discover the best of Los Angeles, with this two-bedroom Brentwood apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this elegantly Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, beautiful living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (#LAX146)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your roomy living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Brentwood apartment has to offer.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

- In-Building Laundry
- Pet Friendly
- Swimming Pool
- Indoor Parking
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. In addition, the historic Brentwood Country Mart is a beloved family-friendly retail hub that first opened in 1948. The Getty Center museum is also located in Brentwood and offers a world-class art collection that is ideal for culture lovers.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Why take a chance picking & choosing between so many individual hosts when you can enjoy the highest-quality guest experience from one consistent host -- Blueground. We are a global real estate tech company offering +3500 fully-equipped & furnished apartments for a month, a year or longer across 12 cities and 3 continents. Centrally-based in vibrant neighborhoods, each home is tech-powered & furnished by our expert Interior Design teams. Enjoy at-home amenities like high-speed WiFi, a fully-stocked kitchen, smart TV, premium bedding/towels, quality toiletries, and depending on the apartment choice -- artisan coffee, bluetooth speakers & select building amenities such as pools, gyms & outdoor spaces. From meal, wine & grocery delivery to laundry & dry-cleaning right to your door, our guests can choose from a number of service benefits. Each apartment is safe & professionally sanitized.

During your stay
Driven by a mission to help you show up & start living, Blueground is proud to host thousands of guests around the world in the following cities: New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Chicago, Washington D.C., Seattle, Dubai, Istanbul, Paris, London and Athens.
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours to enjoy; and for additional support, our Client Experience team is available via phone, email & our Guest App through which you can schedule additional cleanings, request fresh towels/linens, submit maintenance requests, and view neighborhood recommendations. We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description:
The space
It is located in a nicely landscaped private smaller building, in a safe and quiet residential street in the ideal and beautiful area of Brent-Wood, one of the best neighborhoods in LA.
It is a delightful, comfortable Private Master bedroom with cozy queen sized bed, clean, private bathroom, armchair, a closet space, a large closet-wardrobe, a chest of drawers a dresser, a work desk. It is in a very relaxing area for great nights rest, and offers excellent privacy for guests.

The space
This is a charming interesting place with great vibes, which also offers an Amusing Red Carpet V.I.P. Entry-Treatment…! If you wish, as a VIP in my place, You’ll Be Able to Practice the Hollywood Red Carpet Walk as you Enter, at the apartment entrance… It can be Cool and just a lot of fun!

Guest access

“Due to the corona-virus, we
neighborhood_overview:
The small building is Located on a quiet street in Brentwood, one of the most sought after neighborhood of Los Angeles -. Just minutes away, you can immerse yourself in the exciting pleasant, cultural riches and in the little town feelings, that here in Brent-wood are waiting just outside your door. Few Minutes walk to coffee shops, Whole Foods, Supermarkets, San Vicente delightful shops and great restaurants and bus stops just within walking distance. You can take a short walk to shops, and coffee shops, to Brentwood Farmers Market, to popular Bars, to Yoga and various workout classes. It is close to Wilshire Blvd shops, eateries and Wilshire Buses.
This is a great trendy, desirable area to be in, with fresh ocean breeze from nearby St. Monica. It is a perfect stay for solo adventurers, for business travelers, couples, or for pleasure, and a peaceful enough place, very suitable for writing, studying, for teachers, students, etc.
host_about:

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. host_about:
Why take a chance picking & choosing between so many individual hosts when you can enjoy the highest-quality guest experience from one consistent host -- Blueground. Master bedroom with window seat and en-suite bathroom. 2 additional sunny bedrooms and bathroom. Professionally landscaped back and front yards. Ful
neighborhood_overview: Brentwood is best known for sprawling mansions and beautiful views (fun fact: many celebrities live here). With a higher median income and age, the area is relatively calmer than other LA neighbourhoods. While Brentwood is primarily a residential area with many scenic roads for strolling, there is also a 6 block strip of trendy shops, restaurants and bars on San Vicente street. With its greenery and stunning properties, we recommend Brentwood for families and couples looking for a quaint and quiet stay with access to all Los Angeles has to offer.
host_about:
Caroline moved to the USA in the 90's and  started First Class Properties LA and Life's a beach to assist her many UK-based entertainment industry friends looking for short-term and long-term accommodations in Los Angeles. In the passes 10 years since, Caroline has acquired a collection of beautiful rental properties and now caters to a large number of select clients from around the globe.

Caroline hand-picks every property with the primary criteria being stellar views, safe and sought-after locations, walkability, and a general “wow” factor. Many of the properties have fantastic amenities, including pools, spas and gyms, and all of the properties have easy onsite parking. As a professional interior designer, Caroline prefers minimalistic and easy living, a design aesthetic that is immediately identifiable when you set foot into any of her residences.

neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. In addition, the historic Brentwood Country Mart is a beloved family-friendly retail hub that first opened in 1948. The Getty Center museum is also located in Brentwood and offers a world-class art collection that is ideal for culture lovers.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Why take a chance picking & choosing between so many individual hosts when you can enjoy the highest-quality guest experience from one consistent host -- Blueground. We are a global real estate tech company offering +3500 fully-equipped & furnished apartments for a month, a year or longer across 12 cities and 3 continents. Centrally-based in vibrant neighborhoods, each home is tech-powered & furnished by our expert Interior Design teams. Enjoy at-home amenities like high-speed WiFi, a fully-stocked kitchen, smart TV, premium bedding/towels, quality toiletries, and depending on the apartment choice -- artisan coffee, bluetooth speakers & select building amenities such as pools, gyms & outdoor spaces. From meal, wine & grocery delivery to laundry & dry-cleaning right to your door, our guests can choose from a number of service benefits. Each apartment is safe & professionally sanitized.

During your stay
Driven by a mission to help you show up & start living, Blueground is proud to host thousands of guests around the world in the following cities: New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Chicago, Washington D.C., Seattle, Dubai, Istanbul, Paris, London and Athens.
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours to enjoy; and for additional support, our Client Experience team is available via phone, email & our Guest App through which you can schedule additional cleanings, request fresh towels/linens, submit maintenance requests, and view neighborhood recommendations. We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

description:
Unparalleled luxury living experience, the new Tuscan-styled luxury Villas is an ideal choice for those seeking stylish luxury apartments in the Brentwood & Santa Monica area of Los Angeles.

The condo has an in-unit washer/dryer, stainless steel appliances, granite counters, hardwood-style floors and Berber carpeting.

neighborhood_overview:
Perched on LA’s Westside, at the base of the Santa Monica Mountains, Brentwood is an upscale neighborhood teeming with high-end boutiques, fine dining, and luxurious gardens. The main thoroughfare in the community is San Vicente Boulevard, where eateries, cafes, and the historic Brentwood County Mart sit along tree-lined avenues.

Brentwood is also home to the famous Getty Center, which boasts extensive museums, scenic gardens, and stunning views that draw millions of visitors every year. Sprawling estates and luxury apartments comprise the bulk of the rental market in Brentwood, providing many options for a lavish lifestyle in the hills.
