name_left: Sizeable Brentwood 1 BR w/ Outdoor Pool near San Vicente, by Blueground
description:
Discover the best of Los Angeles, with this one-bedroom Brentwood apartment. It’ll be easy to simply show up and start living in this fashionably Blueground furnished apartment with its fully-equipped kitchen, spacious living room, and our dedicated, on-the-ground support. (#LAX358)

The space
Thoughtfully designed with bespoke finishes, modern furnishings, and a fully-equipped kitchen, you’ll enjoy that “I’m home” feeling with this Blueground apartment. Whether you’re lounging in your cheery living room streaming the latest and greatest entertainment on the smart TV or premium wireless speaker, or getting some well-earned rest on the superior quality mattress with luxury linens, you’ll fall in love with everything this Brentwood apartment has to offer.


Amenities

Building amenities unique to this one-bedroom apartment include an on-site:

- In-Building Laundry
- Pet Friendly
- Swimming Pool
- Indoor Parking
neighborhood_overview: This furnished apartment is located in Brentwood, a small area on the Westside of Los Angeles. It is well-known for being one of the wealthiest in the county. The quiet neighborhood features tree-lined streets and impressive, upscale homes. San Vicente Boulevard is the main thoroughfare and is full of Italian eateries and cozy cafes. In addition, the historic Brentwood Country Mart is a beloved family-friendly retail hub that first opened in 1948. The Getty Center museum is also located in Brentwood and offers a world-class art collection that is ideal for culture lovers.
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
Why take a chance picking & choosing between so many individual hosts when you can enjoy the highest-quality guest experience from one consistent host -- Blueground. We are a global real estate tech company offering +3500 fully-equipped & furnished apartments for a month, a year or longer across 12 cities and 3 continents. Centrally-based in vibrant neighborhoods, each home is tech-powered & furnished by our expert Interior Design teams. Enjoy at-home amenities like high-speed WiFi, a fully-stocked kitchen, smart TV, premium bedding/towels, quality toiletries, and depending on the apartment choice -- artisan coffee, bluetooth speakers & select building amenities such as pools, gyms & outdoor spaces. From meal, wine & grocery delivery to laundry & dry-cleaning right to your door, our guests can choose from a number of service benefits. Each apartment is safe & professionally sanitized.

During your stay
Driven by a mission to help you show up & start living, Blueground is proud to host thousands of guests around the world in the following cities: New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco, Boston, Chicago, Washington D.C., Seattle, Dubai, Istanbul, Paris, London and Athens.
Upon arrival, you’ll either be greeted personally by a Blueground team member or given self check-in instructions. The entire apartment is yours to enjoy; and for additional support, our Client Experience team is available via phone, email & our Guest App through which you can schedule additional cleanings, request fresh towels/linens, submit maintenance requests, and view neighborhood recommendations. We’ll share all details upon confirmation of your stay.

name_left: 1BD/1BA Apt with fast wifi  in Brentwood by JBYT
description:
Monthly+ stylish 1BD/1BA apartment perfect for home working and digital nomads by Just Bring Your Toothbrush!

Spacious & professionally decorated beautiful 1BD/1BA apartment with fully equipped kitchen, and updated bathrooms.

Parking is difficult and expensive in Los Angeles.
We offer a designated, secure parking spot within the building with unlimited entry/exit access.

The space
APARTMENT UNIT:
• Bedroom 1: Queen bed
• Approx. square feet: 600
• Fully-equipped kitchen
• Smart TV with Roku, Netflix, etc.
• 1 free parking spot with unlimited in/out privileges
• Dedicated high-speed internet with router (wireless and ethernet)
• Individually controlled heat and air
• Shampoo, conditioner, & body wash in bathrooms
• Hair dryer
• Iron/ironing board
• All utilities included
• Professionally cleaned & managed

APARTMENT BUILDING:
• Communal laundry room with smartpho

The space

The apartment is quiet, private and well laid out. The living room is spacious and looks into the kitchen. neighborhood_overview: If you've ever imagined pleasantville, thats what Brentwood is! Our neighborhood is quiet, residential but in close enough proximity to incredible retail. The neighborhood overlooks the Brentwood country club which makes for a lovely afternoon run around.
host_about:
I'm 28, work in sales within the startup scene and love the outdoors. My two roommates and I love sharing the beauty of the neighborhood and want everyone to revel in the adventures that comes with the hood.  I love to travel by backpack and encourage a tenant with nothing but a backpack to sleep within our abode. I feel comfortable sharing my living quarters with others as long as they respect our place as much as I would to theirs. 

My life mantra is "today you have a choice to be better or worse, but you'll never be the same; what's it going to be?"

Immaculate landscaping highlights the splendid nature all around the house, complete with a grassy yard that features a heated pool and jetted hot
neighborhood_overview:
Los Angeles is known for many things: the entertainment industry, Hollywood Walk of Fame, expansive beaches, a great culinary scene and a renowned nightlife. But if you want to boil LA down to its most essential bits, it’s important to experience the attractions that make it the spectacular city that it is. On any given day, you can swim in the sea, hike up a mountain, see someone famous and shop until you drop.

Brentwood is a family-oriented small suburb of Los Angeles, that’s known as one of the wealthiest areas of Los Angeles. Its population of roughly 235,000 is peppered over the years with affluent professionals, political figures, and celebrities like Harrison Ford, Steve McQueen, Cindy Crawford, Gwyneth Paltrow, Marilyn Monroe, and Arnold Schwarzenegger. The notorious police chase of O.J. Simpson’s white Bronco ended at his Brentwood mansion, located just a few houses away on Rockingham Street.

The 7 best things to do in or near Brentwood (Los Angeles).

name_left: Hobbit House LA- Charming tiny home 7 min to beach
description:
Beautiful semi- subterranean home nestled in the hillside of Palos Verdes, just 7 minutes from the ocean. This is a private back guest house with a private entrance with both indoor and outdoor living space. Very quiet and secluded besides the occasional roosters in the morning.

The space
Beautiful home located on the bridal horse trail in Palos Verdes. Upon arriving, you will park in a designed parking space, cruise by beautiful chickens and a rooster and arrive at the Hobbit House LA. This tiny home has been hand built out of Palos Verdes stone on the outside of a shipping container. Inside you will find a luxurious California King bed, with a cozy down comforter and comfortable sherpa chairs to lounge in. This is the perfect weekend getaway for two.


There is a firepit outside. Let us know if you would like to use it during your stay and we will leave wood out for you to use.

Other things to note
No smoking on the prope
neighborhood_overview: This is a quiet private residence close to the ocean, shopping, and endless outdoor activities. Located on the bridal horse trail, 5 minute walk to the golf course, 7 minutes to the ocean, and 15 minutes to high end restaurants (Terranea and Trump Golf course). 45 minutes to Disneyland, Malibu, and Orange County. Very centrally located.

description:
The house is located in the serene and private hills of Bel Air and it is only a few minutes away from accessing the best of Los Angeles.

The home is very spacious, great for families, has a wonderful backyard, salt water pool, jacuzzi, fruit trees, private yard, BBQ and lounge area.

The space
Monthly rate $24,000
Minimum rental period is 30 days

The open floor plan features hardwood floors, two fireplaces, formal dining room, family room off the kitchen and fully equipped kitchen and laundry room.

All rooms are very spacious, bright and airy.
Two of the bathrooms feature jacuzzi tubs.
Master bedroom has a gas fireplace, separate office, and lots of closet space.

Available upon request:
Masseuse and/or masseur available.
Catering, hair stylist.

Yearly rate $22,000 monthly.
Minimum stay is 30 days

October/April (except for Holidays Dec 16th-Jan 3rd)
$23,000<

name_left: Private Ensuite Room/Bath in Unique Serene Setting
description:
Welcome to a furnished, en-suite bedroom in a quiet modern Japanese architectural home in Bel Air. Minutes from UCLA, Getty Center Museum, Beverly Hills, Century City, Santa Monica & Hollywood. Fully equipped kitchen, pond-waterfall gardens, tea hut, all home amenities.

The space
Our unique home, co-designed by a feng shui master, features tatami mat spaces, shoji screen doors, Japanese and conventional dining areas, wood-burning fireplaces, garden views and external access from every room. There are quality art and artifact appointments throughout the house and grounds. A Kyoto landscape architect designed the private, authentic gardens, with a spacious deck, concealed hearth fire pit (ideal for champagne and toasted marshmallows on a moon-gazing night), secluded quiescent grotto, in addition to the stream, ponds, waterfalls, stone and wood bridges, and hillside tea/meditation hut. Japanese pine giant bonsai trees, bamboos, gingko trees, Japanese maples, rare p
neighborhood_overview:
Location:
•Quiet, safe, upscale residential neighborhood
•Ideal location for UCLA students or visiting family/friends, and for anyone working in or visiting Westwood, Beverly Hills/Rodeo Drive, Brentwood, Century City and Santa Monica areas, each of which has many world-class wining/dining, theater, shopping, market, boutique, mall, gym, yoga studio, coffee/tea house, nightlife, and other entertainment offerings--each only 10-15 minutes away.
•The legendary Bel Air Hotel and Getty Center art museum are in the neighborhood
•The UCLA Medical Center and ER is one of the best in the nation
•The 405 freeway is 8 minutes away: 20 minutes by freeway to downtown LA and to Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), traffic permitting
•On surface streets: 20 minutes west to the beach and east to Hollywood
•Vehicle parking: our circular driveway, and street (unlimited, free and ample)
host_about: Don has resided in West LA most of his life. He is easy going, accessible, fun, considerate and sociable. Don enjoys hanging out with friends, laughing, adventure traveling, meeting new people from all over the world, yoga, meditating, skiing/boarding, music concerts, the beach and relaxing with a good cup of coffee/tea--and his work. Don’s favorite travel spots include the Himalayas, Tibet, Japan, India, SE Asia, and East, North and South Africa.

neighborhood_overview: Nestled in the canyons with a winding road on the eastern edge of Bel Air, Beverly Glen is a busy street during rush hours. It boasts some of the most magnificent and expensive properties in the country and lush scenery for the high-profile locals.
host_about:
Hello Everyone-

I’m Matt. I would love to make my home available to you on your travels! I love to travel myself and have been quite a few places. When traveling I prefer to stay at a fellow Airbnb hosts property vs a hotel chain. I have always had a wonderful experience, it makes me feel right at home in a new location, plus, it's a really fun and great way to meet new people.

Born and raised in Hawaii. Attended University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA). Graduated with a double major in Political Science & History...GO BRUINS! 

I have lived in Bel Air for nearly 15 years. Bel Air is truly an amazing place to call home: all types of food, wine, entertainment, great schools, amazing real estate and centrally located to all LA has to offer. I love live music, animals, outdoor activities, festivals, beach volleyball and more. I love my family & my friends.

While hosting, I have met some really amazing and genuine people from all over the world who have come from all walks of life. Look forward to hosting you. 

Matt

neighborhood_overview:
Beverly Hills is only 3 miles away with all the famous designer boutiques, restaurants and specialty shops. Wolfgang Puck at the Hotel Bel-Air is only 1 mile from the house Bel-Air Hotel along with the exclusive Bel-Air County Club. The Beverly Hills Hotel is 2.5 miles away, proceed further East down Sunset to the heart of more famous nightclubs, restaurants and shops. Also, just a few streets South is West Hollywood. Hollywood Blvd attractions are about an additional 2.5miles East. We are also only .9miles from UCLA and a quaint neighborhood to walk around, eat or go to the movies.
You can get to the beach taking Sunset Blvd West all the way until it ends at famous Gladstones restaurant on the PCH (Pacific Coast Highway). It's a beautiful drive and you can stop and shop, get ice cream in the new Pacific Palisades Village.

host_about:
Welcome to Open Air Homes!  We have been hosting short term rentals for the past 7 years and have always been obsessed with the customer experience.  Your experience.   Open Air Homes is design driven, hospitality focused and always looking to create comfortable experiences for you and your families.   We believe that a high end rental experience starts with the amenities of a hotel along with the conveniences of a home. 

-The Open Air ECOSYSTEM OF COMPANIES-

At Open Air, we continue to reimagine the future of home ownership with our homeowner partners.  A significant number of our former guests have purchased homes and have asked us to help manage and monetize their property while they travel.  We handle every aspect of the property maintenance and management, while ensuring a top of class hospitality experience for all guests in the home. 

-Open Air Design by Interior Particulier-

We have an average of 4.9 stars across our portfolio of homes due to our steadfast commitment to design.  Open Air Design by Interior Particulier believes that great design can happen at a wide variety of price points, and we are here to help our homeowner partners with all of their design needs to set their home up for success in a crowded rental market. 

-Open Air Developments-

At Open Air Developments, we are currently in development of four exciting projects in Los Angeles.  Our flip projects range from small home flips to large scale redevelopments with well established architects. 

-OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman-

OA Real Estate Group at Douglas Elliman, a licensed brokerage, is here to help you find your dream home.  Whether you're looking for an investment property, vacation home, or a long term rental property, our team of agents can help.  CA DRE License (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

Google for local public facilities and activities.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is gated by 24 hour security guards. The landscape is hilly, and both views of the Pacific Ocean and LA can be enjoyed.
host_about:
Hello,

My name is Sunha. I recently graduated from Harvard University with a Master's degree in Religion, Culture, and Politics in 2015. Since then, I have been traveling around the world, from the Americas, to Europe, to hopefully beyond!

I enjoy intellectually stimulating activities and learning about different communities, their people, politics, history, and quirks! I also enjoy watching and playing sports (though I have a fractured hand at the moment :-( ), eating, and cooking. I'd be really interested in checking out the local produce and I have never turned down a local delicacy or drink!

As a guest, I aim to be polite, respectful and easy going.

name_left: The Glass Castle <FILM ONLY> West Lake Village, CA
description:
Our top-of-the-line cleaning service dedicates 8+ hours to the full sanitization of our home prior to check-in, ensuring a hygienic and spotless place to wait out quarantine. Because of recent developments, we have expanded upon our sanitizing procedure with CDC compliant methods, providing special attention to all frequently touched surfaces, such as light switches and doorknobs, and by requiring special equipment for the cleaning staff.

The space
In addition to our extensive cleaning practices, our home’s central location, nearby hundreds of grocery stores and food spots with delivery, makes it the ideal spot to wait out quarantine.

name_left: Indoor Outdoor Sunny Escape in Westlake Village
description:
We LOVE where we live. Far enough from LA to feel like you’re in a small town, but close enough to enjoy all LA has to offer. We are 39 miles from LAX, a gorgeous 16 mile drive through canyon roads to the beach in Malibu, 60 miles to Santa Barbara and a walk to Stonehaus (winery). You’re welcome to ride our bikes around the lake. Soak up the CA sun and RECHARGE in our bright, California indoor/outdoor living poolside floor plan. Quiet neighborhood with ample options to recharge So Cal style.

The space
This is our home. We want you to feel at home too.

In the summer, pool (both ours and the community pool which is always nearly empty) will be heated. If off-season, we can heat for an additional fee.

No smoking or vaping
neighborhood_overview:
Favorite coffee shop: Stonehaus is a beautiful way to start with surroundings of water features, grape vines, and even fireplaces with cozy blankets on chilly mornings. Families are welcome, or hunker down with your lap top and get some work done. I like to take our beach cruiser there, laptop bag in the basket. Of course you can also walk or drive.

Alternative coffee shop - sit on our couch out back near the pool and turn on the gas fire pit. We will leave a blanket for you. Starbucks, Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf, and our Kuerig are all nearby.

Run/walk/bike around Westlake Lake. We can provide 2 mile, 4, mile and 6 mile loop option if you want to stay on the streets. Add a hike to this loop or on its own up Pentachaeta Trail to add some heart pumping, and views of the Santa Monica mountains and lake from above. Did I mention we love where we live?

Greenbelts through the neighborhood to community pool and playground

Brand new spa at Westlake V

neighborhood_overview:
Escape to trendy Westlake Village, a playground in the Santa Monica Mountains. Around the area there are Thousand Oaks Civic Arts Plaza, Ice - Skating at the lakes and Simi Valley Cultural Arts Center. Within walking distance you’ll find The Landing, a low-key sushi bar and grill, and Zin Bistro Americana, known for its inventive new American fare—both offer charming lake-view patios.
Get active at West Lake Tennis (a few minutes’ walk away), hit the trails and see the Santa Monica Mountains up close, or tee-off at the nearby Westlake Golf Course. Afterwards, venture out and discover an array of breweries and wineries along Ventura Freeway.
Catch a show at the Thousands Oak Civic Center, just 6 miles away. Or fill your days with excitement at Universal Studios, Hollywood, downtown LA, the Santa Monica Pier, or the Santa Barbabra Malibu Beverly Hills events —all are under an hour’s drive away.

name_left: Charming Condo in the Heart of Westlake Village
description:
Welcome to our charming upper-level one bedroom condo in the heart of Westlake Village.

This quaint condo is perfect for couples or singles who want to get away from the city life, or are simply passing through and are in need of a restful and safe place to stay.

There is a kitchenette that features a stovetop-oven, microwave and fridge if you wish to make a home cooked meal.

The space
After exploring the wonders of our beautiful Canyons, or winding down from a stressful business trip, you can find comfort in our warm space. Our home features high quality hand-crafted furniture, a smart-TV with ROKU, a quiet and clean bedroom and a relaxing patio overlooking the First Neighborhood. Inside the bedroom is a convenient and efficient wall AC unit, as well as doors and windows to allow fresh air.

Guest access

neighborhood_overview: Our little home is centrally located within walking distance to the Westlake Village Inn golf course, famous StoneHaus wine room, grocery stores and amazing restaurants. Nearby you will find local wineries and gorgeous hiking trails that will be sure to make your stay a truly memorable experience. Just 25 minutes west of the Kanan canyon you will find yourself on the beautiful beaches of Malibu and 40 minutes south, you can be walking the famous Sunset boulevard.
